r: A young woman with no memory wakes up in a very strange and worrying place.

p.c: Ruby Quest
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0001-icon.gif[/img]

In light of the apparent fact that interactive adventures are acceptable [on /tg/], I've decided to continue Ruby here. For those who already saw the first part back when I had to post it on /r9k/, hopefully you'll just bear with me on this one and not provide any undue spoilers until we're past the end of the last one. A flood of /b/█████ migrating from their dying board sort of put a damper on that attempt.

So, get out your parser interface and let's see what we can do here.

[MIRROR'S NOTE: If you want to read this quest as it appears in the original threads,
[url=https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/collection.html?collnum=0]Go here.[/url] ]

[url=/?s=23588]Also read Nan Quest![/url]

p.c: Begin PART 1.
p.b:
Part 1, Chapter 1.

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0002.gif[/img]

Time to begin.
It is very dark here.
Hardly anything can be seen.
Please recommend an action.

p.c: Turn on the damn lights.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0003.gif[/img]

Unfortunately it's too dark in here to tell where the lights are.

p.c: Search pockets.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0004-0005.gif[/img]

Feels like something metallic with a rubber grip. But there's no lighter, matches, or flashlight.

p.c: Walk over to the red thing.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0004-0005.gif[/img]

As near as you can tell, the little red light is only a foot or so away from your face.

p.c: Reach out and grasp for the red light.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0006.gif[/img]

Ah, there we go.
Ruby can see now.

p.c: Ruby: Examine thing you found in your pockets.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0007-0008.gif[/img]

Apparently, it's a hand-turned can opener.

p.c: Ruby: Grab handle near ceiling of cell.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0007-0008.gif[/img]

A row of small mesh holes open in the wall, venting in fresh air.

p.c: Ruby: Yell, "Is anyone there?"
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0009-0010-0011.gif[/img]

Ruby yells, but there's no response. Her voice echoes in the small room.

p.c: Ruby: Attempt to tap into your latent vampiric powers to see if you have a high enough level in Protean to turn into mist and escape the cell through the mesh wiring.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0009-0010-0011.gif[/img]

Sadly, Ruby has no vampiric powers.

p.c: Ruby: Press every button you can find.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0009-0010-0011.gif[/img]

Ruby gets the feeling that pressing all the buttons would probably be a bad idea. There are buttons of multiple colors -- which one should she try?

p.c: Ruby: For the hell of it, purple.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0012.gif[/img]

Sweet success! Ruby presses the purple button and the top of the cell suddenly opens up to cool, clean air!

p.c: Ruby: Get out, look around.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0013.gif[/img]

Ruby surveys her surroundings. There are no doors here, except for a portal on the north wall of this room. Unfortunately, there are metal shutters over the door.

p.c: Ruby: Search that trash can in the back.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0014-0015.gif[/img]

Ruby tries her best, but the lid of the barrel refuses to be pulled from its base. It won't open.

p.c: Ruby: Check the shelves.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0014-0015.gif[/img]

Do you mean the metal shutters? They're blocking the portal to the north.

p.c: Ruby: Look for a way to open the other cell.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0016.gif[/img]

The cell/locker/coffin on the ground has a latch on the outside, but it's sealed with what appears to be a digital lock. There's no obvious way to undo the lock from the locker itself.

p.c: Ruby: Use can opener on can thing in the back.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0017.gif[/img]

The barrel's lid comes up with the can-opener's tenacious efforts!
Inside there's a few small lengths of BARE ELECTRICAL WIRE, but nothing else.

p.c: Ruby: Get some wire.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0018-0019.gif[/img]

Ruby stows a piece of wire in her inventory.

Ruby has no magical or otherwise extraordinary powers. She has no knowledge of where she is or how she got here, and though she is not a specialist and holds no particularly special knowledge she is reasonably competent with things most people would be.
Her physical capabilities are varied. She's limber, in good shape, but not particularly strong.
She is currently carrying:
CAN-OPENER
BARE LENGTH OF WIRE

p.c: Ruby: Chew on wire.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0018-0019.gif[/img]

Ruby is above such primitive practices as chewing on wire and cannibalizing her young. If she had any.
And besides, that would not be productive right now!

p.c: Ruby: Shlick furiously.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0020-0021.gif[/img]

Ruby has slightly bigger concerns at the moment. Slightly. 
But besides, there could be hidden cameras around!

p.c: Ruby: Check the terminal next to the door.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0020-0021.gif[/img]

It would appear these controls are out of order. But even Ruby can tell this looks like an easy fix. Firstly, one of the wires is missing. Splicing it back together would be easy enough with the BARE LENGTH OF WIRE Ruby found. Then, there are connectors at the back of the control panel itself, so it will need to be screwed back into place.

p.c: Ruby: Knock on the other cell.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0022.gif[/img]

Ruby knocks insistently on the metal locker cell, but there's no audible or visible response.

p.c: Ruby: Check the trap on the back left corner.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0023.gif[/img]

There's some kind of access shaft in the corner of the room, complete with a ladder set into the wall, but it's barred off and Ruby can't fit through!

p.c: Ruby: Move the remains of the barrel to one side, see if anything lies under it.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0024.gif[/img]

Ruby tries to shove the big barrel aside, but her physique is just too admirably girlish. It won't budge.

p.c: Ruby: Create a saw using the barrel pieces, wrapping the handle with the BARE ELECTRICAL WIRE. Attempt to saw through the bars.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0025.gif[/img]

Not only would a saw made of razor-sharp barrel-metal and bare wire be INCREDIBLY dangerous to use in ANY way, it certainly wouldn't have the durability or control to cut through these bars, which appear to be a stronger metal than the barrel anyway.

You do get +1 INGENUITY for your idea though.

p.c: Ruby: Check the terminal situated on the wall behind the barrel.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0026.gif[/img]

The digital console appears to be waiting for a command.

p.c: Ruby: Enter command.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0027.gif[/img]

That seemed to do something. A soft click comes from the other locker.

p.c: Ruby: Enter "sound horn".
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0028.gif[/img]

The console doesn't appear to recognize that command.

p.c: Ruby: Enter "open door".
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0029.gif[/img]

That got a response, but unfortunately the results weren't what Ruby had hoped for.

p.c: Ruby: Open the locker.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0030.gif[/img]

Ruby takes the two small coins off the top of the locker and pockets them. She opens it up to find...

There's no one inside the locker.
Instead, all that's inside is a pair of rubber gloves.

p.c: Ruby: Enter "open access shaft".
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0031.gif[/img]

It's asking for a code.

p.c: Ruby: Don the gloves, fix the terminal with the wire, and screw it together using one of the coins.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0032.gif[/img]

A brilliant idea, especially since it negates the possibility of electrocution.
Ruby sets to work splicing the door panel's wires back together.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect the coins.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0033.gif[/img]

The two coins seem to just be ordinary-looking quarters.
But the edges make functional screwdrivers for the flathead screws in the panel!

Ruby screws the repaired panel back in place, and the UP ARROW button lights up green.

p.c: Ruby: Press the green button.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0034.gif[/img]

Here goes nothing.
Ruby presses the button.

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0035.gif[/img]

The metal shutters start to lift...

...oh.

[animated!]

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0036.gif[/img]

...it would appear that Ruby is underwater.

p.c: Ruby: Push down arrow.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0037-0038.gif[/img]

The down arrow still isn't lit, and doesn't respond to being pressed.

p.c: Ruby: Take off gloves, reach out, touch the water.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0037-0038.gif[/img]

Thankfully, there's a big glass window separating Ruby from a horrible drowning death.

p.c: Ruby: Enter 'open access shaft 017'
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0039.gif[/img]

Using the number on the plaque outside as a reference, Ruby attempts to try opening the bars to the access shaft via the computer terminal once more.

p.c: Ruby: Look outside, see how far it is, or if any predatory fish are visible.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0040.gif[/img]

The water is murky. Ruby can see neither the surface nor any details on the sea life swimming past the glass.

After entering the code, the bars on the grate finally slide open with a loud "clank"! The access shaft is accessible!

p.c: Ruby: Descend.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0041.gif[/img]

Ruby descends down the access shaft's ladder. 
Congratulations! You've escaped the first room!

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0042.gif[/img]

Ruby descends the access hatch and comes upon a new room.
There's lots to see here.

p.c: Ruby: Say hello.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0043.gif[/img]

Ruby introduces herself and says hi.
The prisoner introduces himself as "Tom", and says hi back. 

He doesn't seem particularly chatty.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom how long he's been here and what he knows.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0044-0045-0046.gif[/img]

Tom won't say how long he's been here. Just that he woke up in the cell and hasn't gotten out since.

He seems uninterested with this particular line of questioning and returns to contemplating his little sculpture.

p.c: Ruby: Walk into the grid.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0044-0045-0046.gif[/img]

It's just a metal grating.

p.c: Ruby: Carve pumpkin into the shape of a keycard and insert into slot.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0044-0045-0046.gif[/img]

Unfortunately you are not sleuthy enough to figure out how to do this.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect fishtank.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0047.gif[/img]

The fish tank seems to contain, along with the fish, a tiny treasure chest for decoration.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom about statue.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0048.gif[/img]

Tom explains that this is his Opus, titled "The Room is Boring". It appears to consist of a TIN CAN, a LETTER-OPENER, and a METAL PLATE with screws on its four corners.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect fishtank again.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0049-0050.gif[/img]

[color=#808080]>Are any of the fish dangerous?[/color]
The fish are all quite tiny.
And as far as Ruby can tell, none of them are sharks.

p.c: Ruby: Check out grate below the tank.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0049-0050.gif[/img]

It appears to be another sort of access hatch, this time with metal shutters over it. It's labelled "Z-HATCH" and just underneath where that's written there's an empty space with four holes. It looks like something used to go there.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom about the round things on the wall.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0051-0052-0053.gif[/img]

Tom explains that the five things on the walls are very functional buttons, but so far he's only tried pressing the middle one.

p.c: Ruby: Examine that upside-down sprinkler thing.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0051-0052-0053.gif[/img]

It's some sort of switch that can be pulled, but it looks like it's out of reach.

p.c: Ruby: Use can opener to cut through fence.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0051-0052-0053.gif[/img]

The grate is thin, but given that it's a cell the metal is clearly very strong and unlike the barrel, it's not worn. The CAN-OPENER would have no chance against it.

p.c: Ruby: Grab treasure, then dump aquarium on Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0054.gif[/img]

The fishtank is bolted to the pedestal it's on, which in turn is bolted to the floor.
But the little treasure chest is coming with Ruby. It gets added to her inventory, a little wet. It's about the size of her hand.

p.c: Ruby: Open treasure chest.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0055-0056.gif[/img]

It refuses to open. It must be locked.

p.c: Ruby: Get plate, screw in plate, tell Tom to press buttons.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0055-0056.gif[/img]

Firstly, Tom refuses to hand over the plate with the funny numbers on it, because it's a part of his Opus. Secondly, he couldn't pass it through the small openings in the grate even if he wanted to give it to Ruby.
And thirdly, Tom tells Ruby that when he pressed the middle button, he was ELECTROCUTED. He hasn't pressed any of the others and he will refuse to press any of the others until he's confident they won't result in another near-death experience.

Lastly, he has no clue what the overhead hatch does. He's never seen it open.

p.c: Ruby: Check inventory.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0057-0058-0059.gif[/img]

Ruby is carrying TWO COINS, a CAN-OPENER, a pair of RUBBER GLOVES, and now a TINY TREASURE CHEST.

p.c: Ruby: Tell Tom that you don't believe him unless he presses another button.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0057-0058-0059.gif[/img]

Tom pouts and says that's fine, because he doesn't trust you either.

p.c: Ruby: Examine Z-hatch.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0057-0058-0059.gif[/img]

It's a small portal in the north wall. Ruby might be able to fit through if she crawled. But it's a moot point since it's blocked by a metal shutter.

p.c: Ruby: Hand over gloves.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0060-0061-0062.gif[/img]

The gloves won't fit through the grate.

p.c: Ruby: Pry open the chest with the coins.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0060-0061-0062.gif[/img]

No luck, there's not enough of a gap to pry it.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom for the numbers on the metal plate.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0060-0061-0062.gif[/img]

Tom says he doesn't trust you now and he won't tell you the magic numbers on the plate.
Maybe getting him to dislike you was a bad idea; you're probably going to need those numbers.

p.c: Ruby: Offer sexual favors.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0063.gif[/img]

That seems a little extreme! Ruby's not very eager to just give up her body for some stranger to ravage just so she can get a few numbers, especially if there's an alternative. And anyway, she's shy. 

There must be a way to win over the cat that's not quite so embarrassing.

p.c: Ruby: Flash tits.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0064.gif[/img]

Oh no! Unfortunately for all parties involved, Ruby is flat as a board! That probably won't work.

p.c: Ruby: Give the cat the fish.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0065.gif[/img]

Ruby slips Tom some of the small fish as a gesture of goodwill. He's hungry, so he accepts.

p.c: Ruby: Apologize, and mention that you were jealous of his epic Opus.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0066.gif[/img]

Feeling a bit calmed by your offering of fish, Tom graciously offers to rotate the piece to face you.

p.c: Ruby: Go upstairs, enter command.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0067.gif[/img]

Sure enough, Tom's code seems to work, and the system accepts the function.

p.c: Ruby: Go downstairs, tell Tom you'll see where it goes.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0068.gif[/img]

Climbing back down, Ruby finds that the z-hatch is now open. Just on the other side of the wall is a small room.

Ruby tells Tom she'll be right back. Tom nods absently in reply.

p.c: Ruby: Crawl through.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0069-0070.gif[/img]

Ruby gets on all fours and crawls through the hatch with a rather suggestive series of movements. But since that's boring let's just skip ahead to the part where she emerges in the room on the other side of the wall.

p.c: Ruby: Explain what each button seems to do.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0069-0070.gif[/img]

Ruby has no idea what each button seems to do. Perhaps you should interpret.

p.c: Ruby: Take diagram of buttons and give it to Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0071.gif[/img]

It looks like there was something behind the diagram.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect what looks like a safe.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0072-0073-0074.gif[/img]

It's some sort of metal cabinet, but it's locked up with a padlock.

p.c: Ruby: Look through what looks like a grate.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0072-0073-0074.gif[/img]

The slot in the door is closed, and appears to be opened only from the other side.

p.c: Ruby: Take down picture of fish.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0072-0073-0074.gif[/img]

It looks like an eye, actually.

p.c: Ruby: Bring diagram to Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/01/0075.gif[/img]

You bring the diagram to Tom. He is already starting to trust you, and with the added incentive that only one "electrocution" symbol is present on the diagram, you manage to convince him the other buttons will not administer shocks.

Part 1, Chapter 2.

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0076.gif[/img]

Moment of truth.
Which button does Tom press?

p.c: Tom: Button 1.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0077.gif[/img]

Tom hesitates, standing close to the grate... then presses button 1, not for a moment considering the diagram could have been coded based on the key sequence listed on the wall panel by the fishtank.

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0078.gif[/img]

Luckily that doesn't seem to be the case anyway!
...but nothing appears to happen. Except that the button sinks into the wall just like the electro-button did, and for a moment, there seems to be a faint, distant "beep"...

p.c: Ruby: Check panel on wall next to fish tank.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0079.gif[/img]

In actuality, the panel seems to be some sort of card reader. It has three lights, all red right now.

p.c: >Ruby: Go upstairs.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0080.gif[/img]

On returning to the first room, Ruby notices something's changed.

p.c: Ruby: Press down button.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0081.gif[/img]

Ruby presses the DOWN ARROW button, and in the far corner of the room, another hatch opens up.
Looking down, Ruby sees that the shaft leads straight into Tom's cell. 
But there's no ladder.

p.c: Ruby: Tell Tom to press button 2.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0082.gif[/img]

Ruby calls down the open shaft and tells Tom to press button #2 now.

p.c: Tom: Press button 2.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0083.gif[/img]

Tom presses the second button, which causes the metal shutters on the Z-Hatch to shut immediately.

p.c: Tom: Press button 2 again.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0084.gif[/img]

Tom presses the button again and the hatch slides open.

p.c: Ruby: Check inventory.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0085.gif[/img]

Ruby is carrying five items at the moment.

p.c: Ruby: Examine all the symbols closely.
p.b: [img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0086.gif[/img]

p.c: Ruby: Combine all the items.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0087.gif[/img]

Using one COIN, the RUBBER GLOVES, the TINY CHEST, and a piece of the BUTTON DIAGRAM, Ruby fashions together the JUNKOTRON MISSILE LAUNCHER! This baby could break through a steel wall!

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0088.gif[/img]

NO WAIT, THEY DON'T.
Too bad, I thought you were really on to something there.

p.c: Ruby: Enter 'help'.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0089.gif[/img]

The help and information prompt is markedly unhelpful. The system seems to be local, rather than connected to any external source. Which means no internet.

p.c: Ruby: Try to reach down chute and pull lever.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0090.gif[/img]

Unfortunately, the shaft is too far to reach the lever from above.

p.c: Ruby: Toss can-opener down to Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0091.gif[/img]

Look out below.

p.c: Tom: Open the can.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0092.gif[/img]

Tom sets to work opening the can.

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0093.gif[/img]

SUCCESS! 
Tom completely mangles the tin can beyond anything useable due to his incompetence in operating a canopener.

But from inside the sealed can, he recovers an access card!

p.c: Tom: Toss up card and letter opener.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0094.gif[/img]

Despite Tom's impressive and manly physique, the card has too much air resistance because of its shape, and refuses to be tossed up the shaft.

p.c: Tom: Toss it so that the edge goes into the wind, duh.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0095.gif[/img]

It's no use. The ACCESS CARD can't be thrown that far without fluttering uselessly out of control.

The LETTER OPENER on the other hand, sails through the shaft easily.

p.c: Tom: Throw up the panel with 4 screws.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0096-0097.gif[/img]

No problem for someone with such manly physique.

p.c: Ruby: Open up the treasure chest with the letter opener.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0096-0097.gif[/img]

Unfortunately, there are STILL no cracks in the treasure chest big enough to pry anything in! It's sealed flush.

p.c: Ruby: Do something rope-related with the wires.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0098.gif[/img]

Sadly, there's not NEARLY enough wire left in the barrel to make a cord down, even less considered they'd have to be twisted together well enough to hold. Even with the cannibalized circuit panel, there wouldn't be enough.

p.c: Ruby: Go look for useful things in Z-Hatch room.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0099.gif[/img]

Wisely giving up on this poorly-imagined (twisty-wires) line of thought, Ruby instead descends back to explore the lower levels more, now armed with a heftier inventory.
She waves to Tom, whom she is happy to see is still alive.

p.c: Ruby: Screw plate back.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0100.gif[/img]

Ruby decides to replace the nameplate before exploring the Z-Room again.
Despite the fact there are no visible mechanisms, however, once the plate is replaced, an access card emerges from a hidden slot on the fishtank's pedestal.

p.c: Ruby: Use access card in slot.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0101.gif[/img]

The card-reader eats the card. It's gone.

In response, one of the lights turns from red to green.

p.c: Ruby: Go back into Z-Room.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0102.gif[/img]

Ruby re-enters the Z-Room.
Something seems different.

p.c: Ruby: Say hello.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0103.gif[/img]

Ruby's attempts at conversation are futile. The eyes stare coldly and silently from behind the slot in the door.

p.c: Ruby: Examine couch.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0104-0105.gif[/img]

The only interesting thing about the couch is how unremarkable it is. It doesn't even have distinct cushions to rifle through.

p.c: Ruby: Try to remove the eye, using letter opener.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/02/0104-0105.gif[/img]

Ruby fiddles with the letter opener, and in doing so finds out that it fits perfectly into the empty pupil of the eyeball painting.
It locks into position! How about that?

Part 1, Chapter 3.

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0106.gif[/img]

The door makes a soft "click" as Ruby fits the LETTER OPENER in the pupil of the eye painting. Maybe it's unlocked.

She doesn't remember if that handle had been there before or not.

p.c: Ruby: Open the door.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0107.gif[/img]

Fair enough.
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0108.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0109.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0110.gif[/img]

p.c: Ruby: Go into the closet (or hallway) of death.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0111.gif[/img]

It's a small closet, not much room inside. It reeks of death, but at this point, what choice does Ruby have?
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0112.gif[/img]

p.c: Ruby: RUN
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0113.gif[/img]

Ruby flees the room as fast as she can, but the monstrous thing is hot on her heels snaking after her.

p.c: Tom: SHUTTTHEHATCH
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0114.gif[/img]

As Ruby re-enters the room, she shouts at Tom to press button 2 again, and fast. Tom's already in a confused panic after hearing the unearthly screaming.

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0115.gif[/img]

Tom presses the button.
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0116.gif[/img]

p.c: Ruby: Head back into the Z-room.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0117.gif[/img]

Tom opens the hatch just to make sure the monstrous thing is dealt with. No signs of movement come from it or the room beyond, and there is only silence.

Ruby knows that with Tom behind the grate, if she doesn't do this no one will.
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0118.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0119.gif[/img]

Inside the small closet is a ball of string. Ruby takes it with her.

p.c: Ruby: There's something gold in the remains. Pick it up.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0120.gif[/img]

It appears to be a teeny-tiny key.

p.c: Ruby: Use the tiny key on the tiny treasure chest.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0121.gif[/img]

It clicks open softly.
There's an access card inside.

p.c: Ruby: Use string to retrieve keycard now.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0122.gif[/img]

Ruby heads back into the room with the cell...

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0123.gif[/img]

Ruby calls down the instructions, then lowers the string.
Tom ties the card to the end, and Ruby pulls it back up.

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0124.gif[/img]

Tom asks Ruby to let him out.

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/03/0125.gif[/img]

Tom really wants to come out.
Tom says he's scared and he's trapped.
Tom asks Ruby to please let him out now.

Part 1, Chapter 4.

[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/04/0126.gif[/img]

Tom asks Ruby to please let him out.
Tom asks Ruby to please not leave him here.

p.c: Ruby: Let Tom out.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/04/0127.gif[/img]

Ruby uses the two remaining access cards, and the reader promptly turns green for all three lights.
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/04/0128.gif[/img]

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Hug.
p.b: [img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/04/0129.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/04/0130.gif[/img]

p.c: End PART 1.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/ruby/04/0131.gif[/img]

~To Be Continued~

Thank you all for your patience, encouragement, and participation.
This is not the end of the story by any means. 
There is still more to come.

But for now, we must close the book on this story.
And resume another time.

p.c: Begin PART 2.
p.b:
Part 2, Chapter 1.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229933426767.gif[/img]

Tom is free from his cell, but both he and Ruby are still stuck in an unfamiliar place.

[MIRROR'S NOTE: Spoilers marked with '?' contain extra comments/suggestions.]

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Go up ladder.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229933664900.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby both go back up to the room Ruby woke up in.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Terrified sex to comfort each other in this horrifying place.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229933664900.gif[/img]

Ruby is far too shy to do something like that with a stranger, especially in this situation, especially with the fact there could be hidden cameras watching. It's not the kind of thing she'd want to have someone get on tape.
Besides, there are more pressing matters right now!

p.c: Tom: Check inventory.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229934009956.gif[/img]

Tom is carrying the canopener Ruby found, as well as a tap and one unopened condom.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Check for cameras, get really drunk, then have sex.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229934009956.gif[/img]

There are no cameras visible here, but Ruby is still too self-conscious to ignore the possibility they might just be hidden.
Also, there's no alcohol around!

p.c: Ruby: Inspect fish tank.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229934009956.gif[/img]

A few large fish-shaped shadows move through the murky water beyond the large porthole. It's hard to see much of anything through it.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom if he knows what this place is.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229933664900.gif[/img]

Tom already explained he woke up in his cell downstairs, and doesn't know what this place is.

p.c: Tom: Demonstrate MANLY PHYSIQUE, push barrel to the side.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229934223165.gif[/img]

No problem for a strong man like Tom!

p.c: Tom: Inspect cubbyhole.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229934425141.gif[/img]

The small recess in the wall doesn't lead anywhere. However, there is yet another ACCESS CARD inside. Tom pockets it.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom why he has a condom...
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229934425141.gif[/img]

Tom says he doesn't know. He just woke up with it in his pockets. He doesn't remember carrying it.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: After inspecting the niche, pull the lever.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229934730656.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby head back down the access hatch.
The lever is rather high. It's possible that even the two of them together won't be able to reach it.

p.c: Tom: Push barrel down the open, ladderless hatch.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229934873137.gif[/img]

Look out below.

p.c: Tom: Flip barrel over. Ruby: Climb on top, lift Tom up to lever.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229935636320.gif[/img]

The barrel got a little crushed from the impact.
Tom flips over the barrel. But Ruby realizes that with her girlish figure she'd never be able to lift Tom.

p.c: Tom: Switch around, lift Ruby instead.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229935965185.gif[/img]

Tom obligingly lifts Ruby up with some effort, and they balance precariously on the dented barrel.
Ruby reaches for the pullswitch.

p.c: Ruby: Pull.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229936368262.gif[/img]

Ruby yanks the pullswitch down with determined force. 
Something upstairs gives a low, ominous rumble that echoes through the walls.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229936411531.gif[/img]

The pullswitch cord suddenly snaps up into the ceiling. The noise has stopped.

[spoiler open="?" close="?"][left]HEY
SOMEONE'S PEEKING[/left][/spoiler]

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Go back up and see what that noise was.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229936818768.gif[/img]

Upon climbing back up the access hatch, the change seems immediately obvious.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Step through into the darkness.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229937085557.gif[/img]

Ruby decides they should both simultaneously step blindly into the darkness beyond the doorway.

[spoiler open="?" close="?"][left][color=#808080]>Tom is eaten by a grue.
>Ruby is eaten by a grue.[/color][/left][/spoiler]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229937486241.gif[/img]

As they enter the room, the lights suddenly turn on. Luckily for them, there appears to be no danger here.

There is a sealed door to the west, with a padlock.

p.c: Tom: Check the console. Try the card in that slot.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229937819861.gif[/img]

Tom slips the card into the slot, where it disappears with a click. However, there's no response from the console whatsoever. It's not even turning on.

p.c: Ruby: Check if you're standing on a trap door.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229937819861.gif[/img]

Ruby's not standing on a trap door, but there's a rectangular imprint here, as if something used to be here. 
[color=#808080]>So, is that the door we came in by at the bottom of the screen?[/color]
Yes.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect strange hook like thing on wall.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229938234737.gif[/img]

There's some sort of raised rectangle on the wall which prominently features some strange marking. At the bottom of the marking, where the lines meet, there's a cross-shaped indentation.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Check box thing in the corner.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229938662413.gif[/img]

The box doesn't appear locked, but around the latch it's been sealed shut with what looks like glue or calk.

p.c: Ruby: Check what's on top of box thing.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229938662413.gif[/img]

Some kind of disc lies on top of the locker. It features an image of an eye and has a single protrusion.

p.c: Ruby: Poke it now. In the eye.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229938836429.gif[/img]

Tom gives Ruby a strange look as she pokes the eye. It feels like wood, and doesn't react in any way.

p.c: Ruby: Take the disc.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229938836429.gif[/img]

Ruby grabs and pockets the wooden disc.

p.c: Ruby: Use tiny key on lock.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229938836429.gif[/img]

The tiny key (from the TREASURE BOX) has already been used up.

p.c: Ruby: Go back to Z-hatch room, grab letter opener so we can pry open chest.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229939302845.gif[/img]

Ruby heads back to the room beyond the Z-hatch.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect the eye to see what happened to the letter opener. Compare eye you're holding to eye on wall.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229939576693.gif[/img]

Dark red stains have trailed down from the eye. The letter opener is gone.
The eyes are similar in that they are both eyes, but they're not particularly distinctive and they're obviously not the same size.

p.c: Ruby: Take closer look at the pipe.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229939693298.gif[/img]

[color=#808080]>Is the blue stripe painted on, or is that a window to the interior?[/color]
Upon close inspection, the pipe running from the ceiling to the east wall is painted with a blue stripe, probably for identification purposes.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect death closet.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229939576693.gif[/img]

Nothing's changed. It's still a rather bare and bloody closet.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect wall safe.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229940129348.gif[/img]

Nothing new there either. Still locked, the cabinet refuses to budge.

p.c: Ruby: Use disc on wall safe.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229940129348.gif[/img]

There doesn't appear to be any way the disc can work on the safe. Further, the circular symbol on the safe is not a recess, it's simply painted on.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom to come downstairs.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229941094158.gif[/img]

Ruby returns upstairs to get Tom to come down with her.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229941137836.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom return to the room. Tom doesn't look so well.

Ruby realizes Tom hasn't seen this room yet.

[spoiler open="?" close="?"][left]Comfort Tom. Remind him that we're a herbivorous bunny girl, and he's supposed to be Mr. Gar Cat Guy. If we can stomach it, so can he.
---
[color=#777]>we're a herbivorous bunny girl[/color]
/tg/ - a herbivorous bunny girl[/left][/spoiler]

p.c: Tom: Move couch.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229941378599.gif[/img]

Ruby politely asks Tom to move the couch. With his MANLY PHYSIQUE, the task is no problem, and the wide couch slides away from the wall, revealing a small access hatch even smaller than the Z-Hatch used to enter this room. It appears to open into a lit room on the other side.

p.c: Ruby: Carefully peek into other room. CAREFULLY.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229941706756.gif[/img]

Ruby kneels down to see that the room beyond has bare metal walls and exposed pipes and circuitry, and is probably some sort of maintenance area. There don't appear to be any immediate dangers like people, fire, or big, obvious traps.
Due to the size of the hatch, however, only Ruby, with her GIRLISH FIGURE would be able to squeeze through. Tom would have to stay behind somewhere.

[spoiler open="?" close="?"][left]this is seriously like the worst porno ever[/left][/spoiler]

p.c: Ruby: Get out canopener for self defense.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229941706756.gif[/img]

Ruby requests the canopener back from Tom, who returns it.

p.c: Ruby: Crawl through hatch and have Tom wait back in his cell.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229942170530.gif[/img]

Tom agrees to wait where you found him, rather than in the bloody room. Ruby crawls through.

Ruby emerges in the new room, which does indeed appear to be a maintenance room. Piping is everywhere. A glass tube runs to the ceiling, and the east wall features a vent and a circuitboard. The blue pipe runs through here.

[spoiler open="?" close="?"][left]WHO THE FUCK IS THAT (ask them nicely)[/left][/spoiler]

p.c: Ruby: Wave at person looking through window.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229942423596.gif[/img]

There's no one in the room but Ruby.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect everything.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229942885903.gif[/img]

There's a circuitboard on the east wall. It appears to be missing a square component, but no wires are damaged.
Above it is a closed vent.
There's a device containing purple liquid, with a sort of pluglike hole set it in, and beneath that, drips of purple. There's no visible faucet to remove the liquid.
There's what appears to be a pneumatic tube running through the ceiling with a small compartment here.
There's a metal transfer compartment in the wall, like a bank deposit drawer.
There's a strange device near the west wall with an LED readout that says "sample", but has no obvious buttons, controls, or instructions beyond that.

p.c: Ruby: Recheck inventory.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229943660064.gif[/img]

Ruby is carrying two coins, rubber gloves, a button diagram, a ball of string, and a canopener.

p.c: Ruby: Get a cup from the water cooler, and get some of that purple drank.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3221863/images/1229943660064.gif[/img]

There are no cups here, and even if there were, there's no faucet on the front of the liquid's container, just a socket.

p.c: Ruby: Open the metal drawer.
p.b:
Part 2, Chapter 2.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229944188969.gif[/img]

There appears to be something inside.

p.c: Ruby: Look out the window and scout the surroundings.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229944916855.gif[/img]

At this angle Ruby can't see much in the small adjacent room, save for three things:
1. Some sort of dummy on a post.
2. A large red stain on the opposite wall.
3. A round device on the wall -- looks like a clock.

p.c: Ruby: Put on gloves and pick up the severed hand.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229944916855.gif[/img]

Ruby uses her gloves to pick up the icky hand, but there's only stains underneath it. She can't tell how it was severed, but it looks fairly fresh.

p.c: Ruby: Get tap from Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229944916855.gif[/img]

Ruby calls to Tom, who tosses his tap through the hatch for her.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229944999380.gif[/img]

Ruby attaches the tap to the container of purple liquid, which now seems ready to dispense.

p.c: Ruby: Fill one glove with purple drank.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229944999380.gif[/img]

The gloves are too thick and sturdy to just tie off with the thin string. They certainly wouldn't keep the liquid in.

p.c: Ruby: Put severed hand in pneumatic mail chute.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229945187693.gif[/img]

Ruby puts the disembodied hand into the pneumatic chute.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229945457262.gif[/img]

As soon as the chute's door closes, the sound of loud pneumatic pressure comes from the tube. The hand quickly and messily travels up the tube and out of sight.

p.c: Ruby: Use Tom's condom to hold the purple stuff.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229945696129.gif[/img]

Ruby calls Tom to the hatch and explains that she needs his condom.
Tom gets an odd look on his face.

p.c: Ruby: Explain what you intend to do with it.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229946050268.gif[/img]

Tom's expression changes, but he passes the condom through the hatch nonetheless.

[spoiler open="?" close="?"][left]"tom can I have your condom?"
:3
"No. not for that reason."
:[[/left][/spoiler]

p.c: Ruby: Fill condom with purple drank.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229946338410.gif[/img]

Ruby unwraps the condom and fills it with the purple liquid, which smells unpleasantly plastic.

p.c: Ruby: Put purple stuff in sampler thing.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229946638518.gif[/img]

In a somewhat unpleasant move, Ruby tips the condom upside down and pours out the purple liquid into the funnel. 

The LED display changes after a moment.

p.c: Ruby: Take some blood from box and put it in sampler.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229947013282.gif[/img]

Ruby uses the gloves to drip a quantity of blood into the funnel, which prompts a new LED display.

p.c: Ruby: Take some zombie blood and put it in sampler.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229947588980.gif[/img]

Ruby flecks some of the spilt blood into the sampler, which displays yet another new prompt.

p.c: Ruby: Find some blood from head itself.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229948013153.gif[/img]

Ruby crawls out of the hatch to get a sample from the head itself.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229948434043.gif[/img]

That's odd.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom if he saw the head when he was in his cell.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229949028474.gif[/img]

Tom insists he was just in the other room and the head was still there. He definitely didn't see it come through here.
Tom speculates that if it went anywhere there would be a blood trail. He suggests perhaps it simply dissolved like the rest of the body.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229949206437.gif[/img]

Tom's looking a little uneasy again.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Get to fresher air.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229949669280.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom move back into the prison room for fresher air.

p.c: Ruby: Contemplate kissing Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229949669280.gif[/img]

Ruby contemplates kissing Tom, and wonders if he might get the wrong idea.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229949993416.gif[/img]

Tom begins vomiting.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229950307819.gif[/img]

Tom says he is having excruciating, sharp stomach pains. He says he wasn't feeling this before. It's very sudden.

p.c: Ruby: Sample the blood. Fast.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229950625036.gif[/img]

Ruby dabs some blood up on one of the fingers of the glove and excuses herself. She promises to be right back.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229950809362.gif[/img]

Back at the sampler, Ruby inserts a sample of Tom's blood and the LED triggers a familiar message.
Maybe the machine isn't made to analyze blood.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229951445300.gif[/img]

Ruby considers her options carefully. Tom's suddenly sick and there are no doctors around. This could be serious.

p.c: Ruby: LOOK BEHIND YOU
p.b: [img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229951647018.gif[/img]

p.c: Ruby: Nervously wave.
p.b: [img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229951900533.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229952183206.gif[/img]

...it's just a mirror.

p.c: Ruby: Try mixing blood with purple stuff.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229952720561.gif[/img]

Thinking of no other way to do it, Ruby pours a little of the purple stuff from the tap to the floor, then flecks blood onto it from the glove.
It hisses and smokes violently. It smells caustic, like burnt plastic.

p.c: Ruby: Use purple stuff on fish.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229953093682.gif[/img]

Ruby goes back to the other room, retrieves the last two fish from the tank, and touches one of them to the purple puddle.
It sizzles and smokes visibly, and the scales start to dissolve slightly.

p.c: Ruby: Use fish on analyzer.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3222564/images/1229953622410.gif[/img]

Ruby, feeling a bit disgusted, mashes up the fish as best she can to get it to fit in the funnel.

Part 2, Chapter 3.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229954206869.gif[/img]

Moments after Ruby inserts the fish-paste into the funnel, a new message appears on the LED display.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229954355930.gif[/img]

A few seconds later, a new display comes up.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229954454021.gif[/img]

A third message pops up with a loud buzzing sound. 
Evidently something is not receiving power.

p.c: Ruby: Fill condom with purple fluid, and bring it upstairs.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229955805981.gif[/img]

Ruby fills the condom with purple fluid, ties it off for safety, and heads back out. 
Tom's looking unhealthy.

p.c: Ruby: Use fluid on glue.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229956114896.gif[/img]

Ruby fumbles with the condom, rather unfamiliar with these things, and finally tears it open a bit harder than she intended to. 
Thankfully she avoids contact with the purple stuff and it spills all over the glue. It doesn't damage the box, but the glue dissolves rapidly.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229956341043.gif[/img]

Inside the box, Ruby finds a small electronic chip and a Longshoreman’s hook. She takes both.

p.c: Ruby: Do a pirate impression to lighten the mood.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229956716122.gif[/img]

Ruby heads downstairs on her way to the circuitboard. She explains to Tom that he has arsenic poisoning and she's going to get a cure for him.

Also, to lighten the mood, Ruby does her best pirate impersonation, complete with the voice.
Tom smiles weakly.

p.c: Ruby: Put the chip in the circuit board.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229956936763.gif[/img]

Ruby plugs the chip into the circuitboard, and the frame glows a bright green as the air around her hums warmly.
Power must be back on.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229957160466.gif[/img]

Something mechanical in the walls moves and a filled vial suddenly pops up with a pneumatic whoosh from the analyzer.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229957487457.gif[/img]

Unfortunately, returning the power grid to full functionality seems to have triggered another effect as well.
The room is bathed in red light.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229957809018.gif[/img]

A loud hissing sound comes from above the circuitboard as the blinds on the duct open and start venting something into the room.

p.c: Ruby: Remove the chip.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229958274812.gif[/img]

The circuitboard is protected by the green field -- even with the rubber gloves on, it's too painful for Ruby to touch!

p.c: Ruby: Turn on pneumatic tube
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229958676184.gif[/img]

The pneumatic tube only works when it's closed!

p.c: Ruby: Break the tube.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229959194777.gif[/img]

Summoning all her strength, Ruby bashes open the pneumatic tube with the door still closed!
An impressive vaccuum force begins drawing in the noxious smoke... but it's a temporary solution. The gas is still pouring in, and the room is still sealed!

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229959626856.gif[/img]

The pressure from the tube quickly dies out, and the gas is still coming. 
Ruby considers whether or not breaking the mirror would lift the lockdown. Remember, she couldn't fit through the hole even when the mirror wasn't there.

p.c: Ruby: Break mirror.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229960070805.gif[/img]

Ruby decides she has no other choice -- the mirror has to go! Maybe, just maybe, it'll provoke a good reaction!

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223168/images/1229960555650.gif[/img]

Ruby rears back, then smashes at the barrier before her, and the mirror shatters with an echoing cacaphony of breaking glass!

Part 2, Chapter 4.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229961666275.gif[/img]

Ruby has broken the mirror.
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229961961589.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229962253628.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229962655278.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229963166292.gif[/img]

p.c: HOOK
p.b: [img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229963615927.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229963950460.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229964371757.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229964722361.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229964960329.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229965235201.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229965648632.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229965959967.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3223688/images/1229965989404.gif[/img]

...the alarm seems to have stopped.

Part 2, Chapter 5.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3224307/images/1229966357745.gif[/img]

The hatch door is open again.
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3224307/images/1229966531691.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3224307/images/1229966812200.gif[/img]

Ruby feels like she is about to black out.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3224307/images/1229967037238.gif[/img]

The world is closing in around Ruby.
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3224307/images/1229967712912.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3224307/images/1229967987825.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3224307/images/1229968014552.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3224307/images/1229968038069.gif[/img]

Everything goes

black

p.c: End PART 2.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/W6aq_TOvo3hjsaJz/rubyiconblack.png[/img]

Thanks for bearing with me, folks. It's been a fun TEN STRAIGHT HOURS I've been doing this (+2 hours prep beforehand for room design/drawing).
I'm sure you've already noticed I'm not particularly artistic, nor a particularly quick-draw. Today's portion of the adventure was fun, I learned some things about my limits (e.g. avoid action scenes like the monster fight, that took up a whole goddamn thread, even though most of it was the 40+ responses per image), and we made some progress.
I've been trying to give people more freedom with their actions since a lot of people were accusing me of railroading early on, so I hope that was a bit more fun as well.

Don't worry, Ruby's story isn't over yet. There's still more to come, soon enough.
Thanks for your support, /tg/.
[img]https://file.garden/@mspfa-archive/discord/attachments/277259751929282563/321753426935545856/metal_glen_1.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/@mspfa-archive/discord/attachments/277259751929282563/321753433776455681/metal_glen_2.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/@mspfa-archive/discord/attachments/277259751929282563/321753439854133250/metal_glen_3.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/@mspfa-archive/discord/attachments/277259751929282563/321753445084430348/metal_glen_4.png[/img]

p.c: Begin PART 3.
p.b:
Part 3, Chapter 1.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230366592824.gif[/img]

Ruby wakes up.

p.c: Ruby: Where are you?
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230366739419.gif[/img]

Ruby appears to be in a bed.
She feels mostly unhurt, but disoriented. She appears to be in one piece.

p.c: Ruby: Inventory.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230366874836.gif[/img]

Ruby is wearing pajamas.
She is not carrying any items.

p.c: Ruby: Open the curtain.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230367140507.gif[/img]

The curtain is already open.

p.c: Ruby: Look out the window.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230367140507.gif[/img]

Morning sunlight streams in through the window. It's too bright to see much with her eyes adjusted to the darkness.

[s]It's going to be a long day.[/s]

p.c: Ruby: Try to think back BEFORE we woke up in the coffin.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230367140507.gif[/img]

Ruby can't remember a coffin.

Ruby knows something:
This is her bedroom.

p.c: Ruby: Open drawer.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230367486896.gif[/img]

There's a COPPER KEY inside.
Ruby pockets the COPPER KEY.

p.c: Ruby: Are you able to see someone else?
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230367813293.gif[/img]

TOM is here.

p.c: Ruby: Say hello.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230368390611.gif[/img]

Ruby says hi to Tom. She wonders why Tom is in her bedroom.
Tom does not respond.

p.c: Ruby: Check Tom's face.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230368595897.gif[/img]

Ruby gently turns Tom around to look at his face.
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230368757579.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230368935465.gif[/img]

That isn't Tom and this isn't Ruby's room.

p.c: Ruby: Check the door.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230369166377.gif[/img]

The odd door is set into the wall, flush with its edges. It is also locked.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect inventory.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230369166377.gif[/img]

Some of Ruby's items are missing.
She is also holding a COPPER KEY.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect circular thing on wall.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230369553167.gif[/img]

There's a strange circular thing on the wall opposite the broken window/mirror, which looks almost like a clock. There are no hands, but there is a circular peg in the center.
There are no numbers, only four odd symbols.

p.c: Ruby: Use our big bunny ears to listen to the box labeled DO NOT OPEN.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230369553167.gif[/img]

There's no sound coming from inside that Ruby can make out.

p.c: Ruby: See if the door is unlocked.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230369553167.gif[/img]

The door has a small copper lock.

p.c: Ruby: Figure out if climbing through the window is a safe method of leaving.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230369553167.gif[/img]

The window is still too small for Ruby to fit through, and even if she could, it's lined with sharp broken plate glass.

p.c: Ruby: Check wastebin next to dummy.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230369553167.gif[/img]

It looks almost like a filing cabinet. There's only one drawer, but it won't open. It seems jammed, rather than locked, since there's no keyhole.

p.c: Ruby: Check sink.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230369904256.gif[/img]

There's a small depression on the surface, just beside the sink's basin. Otherwise, the sink is unremarkable, if a bit bare.

p.c: Ruby: Fiddle with the knobs on the sink.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230369904256.gif[/img]

Ruby turns the knobs, but no water comes out. Maybe it's broken.

p.c: Ruby: Check blue banner.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230369904256.gif[/img]

A large tarpaulin is stretched tightly over the wall above the window.

p.c: Ruby: Tap DO NOT OPEN box.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230370340348.gif[/img]

The box does not respond to Ruby's provocation.

p.c: Ruby: Open DO NOT OPEN box.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230370340348.gif[/img]

The crate is closed tightly. Ruby will never be able to open it with her bare hands.

p.c: Ruby: Try to RIP N TEAR scarecrow.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230370340348.gif[/img]

The post dummy is too sturdy to tear apart bare-handed.

p.c: Ruby: Look under, or remove banner.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230370500933.gif[/img]

The blue tarpaulin is firmly nailed to the wall, too tightly to just pull down even if Ruby COULD reach it at a comfortable angle. It's also too tight to peek under.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect black window, and the little diagram next to it.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230370500933.gif[/img]

It's some sort of digital screen, but it's blank.
Immediately underneath it is what appears to be a high-tech palm scanner.

p.c: Ruby: Use copper key on copper lock.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230370647300.gif[/img]

The door unlocks and the key becomes predictably stuck.

The door can be opened now.

p.c: Ruby: Put your hand on the palm scanner.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230370932902.gif[/img]

Ruby's palm doesn't work. The machine beeps once with a very incorrect-sounding beep, and a tiny red light blinks a few times.

p.c: Ruby: Take a piece of glass and cut up the dummy.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230370932902.gif[/img]

Ouch!
The glass is too dangerously sharp to use as a tool, and the dummy's exterior is thick and padded. Ruby's skin gives way before the dummy's and she accidentally cuts her palm with the glass.

p.c: Ruby: Try to remove the nails from the tarp.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230371264463.gif[/img]

The nails aren't in all the way, so they can't be pried with the coins, but despite her strongest efforts, they still refuse to be pulled out of the wall with Ruby's bare hands.

p.c: Ruby: Is that a hangman's noose around the dummy's neck?
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230371575528.gif[/img]

It appears to be. Ruby fusses with it but can't get it untied.

p.c: Ruby: Open the drawer that had the hand in it.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230371575528.gif[/img]

It's bloody, but empty.

p.c: Ruby: Look outside the broken window.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230371814690.gif[/img]

It's the maintenance room that Ruby was trapped in, fought something in, and was nearly poisoned with a flood of gas in. It looks the same as before.

p.c: Ruby: Go through door.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230371814690.gif[/img]

Ruby opens the door...

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230372130981.gif[/img]

...this place looks familiar.

The door seems to have been set into the wall in such a way as to appear hidden when closed.

p.c: Ruby: Go upstairs.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230372329362.gif[/img]

Ruby is back in the room with the lockers.

p.c: Ruby: Look at the terminal to see if there's anything new.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230372329362.gif[/img]

Nothing new has appeared on the console.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect the buttons on your locker.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230372987449.gif[/img]

The buttons are all unlit and gray now. Pressing them yields no result.
However, there's a familiar-looking vial inside the locker labeled "Succimer".
Ruby pockets the ARSENIC ANTIDOTE.

p.c: Ruby: Check other locker.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230373273296.gif[/img]

Ruby finds her BALL OF STRING, and pockets it.

p.c: Ruby: Back down the laddder.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230373543333.gif[/img]

Ruby returns to the lower room, and notices that the lever on the ceiling has descended again.

p.c: Ruby: Use the key and string to make a lasso.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3251532/images/1230373977844.gif[/img]

Ruby doesn't have the key, it got stuck in the lock.
It showed up in her inventory because SOMEONE was too careless to delete it from the display after it got used up.

She certainly can't reach it like this, even standing on the heavy barrel.

p.c: Ruby: Go to Z-room.
p.b:
Part 3, Chapter 2.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230374240526.gif[/img]

Ruby enters the back room through the Z-Hatch.

p.c: Ruby: Say hello.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230374382799.gif[/img]

Ruby cautiously says hello and introduces herself.
The man greets Ruby and introduces himself as "Red".

p.c: Ruby: Ask Red some things.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230374595436.gif[/img]

Ruby asks Red a number of questions. He responds very calmly and briefly to each one.
He doesn't know how he got here.
He doesn't know how long he's been here.
He doesn't know what this place is.
He hasn't seen anyone by Tom's description.

p.c: Ruby: Ask him if he'd like to escape with her.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230374814481.gif[/img]

Red shakes his head.
Red tells Ruby there's nothing to escape from.
He's not trapped anywhere.

Red is very uninterested in all of Ruby's questions.

p.c: Ruby: Ask him for help pulling the lever.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230374996212.gif[/img]

Ruby asks Red to help pull the lever.
Red smiles and agrees to go with Ruby.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230375290608.gif[/img]

Red obligingly follows Ruby to the other room, and offers to pull the lever himself.
He stands on his toes on the barrel and uses his cane to latch the lever.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230375563976.gif[/img]

Red smiles, his action successful.
The lever again snaps back into the ceiling and a loud shifting sound comes from upstairs.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Red...
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230375792452.gif[/img]

Red says he is getting very tired of Ruby's questions.
Red tells Ruby that if she doesn't stop asking questions he might have to bite her throat out.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230375921907.gif[/img]

Red smiles at Ruby's reaction.
He says he is
just kidding.

p.c: Ruby: Give Red some fish.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230375563976.gif[/img]

There are no more fish, Ruby used the last ones to test the sample. All that remains is the painted fish on the back wall of the aquarium tank.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Red...
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230375563976.gif[/img]

Ruby decides maybe it's best not to ask Red anything more right now.

p.c: Ruby: Thank Red, and go upstairs.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230376225572.gif[/img]

Ruby returns upstairs.

p.c: Ruby: Enter computer room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230376414403.gif[/img]

Ruby enters the other room. 
The screens have changed. Perhaps restoring power brought this system back online.
The eye-marked disc is on the floor where Ruby knocked it after opening the chest earlier.

p.c: Ruby: Pick up monocol, examine screens closer.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230376666662.gif[/img]

There is no "monocol" here!

There's text on the monitors.

p.c: Ruby: Press Y.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230377038107.gif[/img]

Ruby pockets the wooden disc with the eye on it and the triangle on one end.
Several small, difficult to see images appear on the secondary monitors.
Ruby presses Y.

A larger, clearer image appears on the main monitor.

p.c: Ruby: Press C.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230377561410.gif[/img]

Ruby presses "C". A new image comes up.

p.c: Ruby: Keep pressing C.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230378298905.gif[/img]

Tom.

p.c: Ruby: Keep cycling.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230378798862.gif[/img]

The system doesn't seem to show any more cameras.

p.c: Ruby: Get Red to help you remove the tarp.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230378957128.gif[/img]

Ruby heads to the maintenance room.
Red isn't in the cell room anymore.

p.c: Ruby: Back to the cure/acid room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230379269693.gif[/img]

Ruby returns to the maintenance room.

p.c: Ruby: Yell "Tom" into the tube.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230379514408.gif[/img]

There's no answer. The tube must not work that way.

p.c: Ruby: Tie the button diagram around the tube with the string to see if we can restore some suction.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230379933456.gif[/img]

The thick paper of the diagram curves around the pipe and suddenly gets stuck over the hole as the suction is restored. The hole is sealed with the makeshift patch, but it might not last very long.
Ruby ties it in place with string just to be safe.

p.c: Ruby: Send antidote.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230380140800.gif[/img]

Ruby puts the ARSENIC ANTIDOTE in the pneumatic tube, and on closing the door, it shoots up and out of sight.

p.c: Ruby: Rush back to see where it went on the cameras.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230380714233.gif[/img]

Ruby returns to the room with the monitors.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230380961908.gif[/img]

Tom drinks the ARSENIC ANTIDOTE.

p.c: Ruby: Examine everything.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252231/images/1230381455234.gif[/img]

The bottom of the door is warped and rusted, as if from water damage.
Neither the symbol on the wall nor its inset cross-shaped socket have changed.
The panel in the lower-right features five familiarly-labeled buttons.

Part 3, Chapter 3.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230381872512.gif[/img]

Red appears in the doorway.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Red...
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230382075249.gif[/img]

Red reminds Ruby that he doesn't want her to keep asking questions.
Red smiles.

p.c: Ruby: Say alright. Say you're going to be leaving the room to explore.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230382265279.gif[/img]

Red says he doesn't think so.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230382435914.gif[/img]

Red smiles.
Red says he is JUST KIDDING again.
Red moves aside for Ruby and says ladies first.

p.c: Ruby: Now kindly gtfo.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230382978265.gif[/img]

Red follows Ruby downstairs.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230383448553.gif[/img]

Red asks Ruby if he can have the coins she's carrying.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230384075379.gif[/img]

Ruby hands Red her two coins.

p.c: Ruby: Carry on to the dummy room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230384443528.gif[/img]

Ruby enters the Dummy room.
Red follows Ruby in.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect the dummy; see if there is a reason it is rotating.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230384545495.gif[/img]

The dummy's bolted base appears to be on a swivel, so if pushed, it can rotate.

p.c: Ruby: Request tarp pulling.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230384649527.gif[/img]

Ruby requests Red's help taking the tarp down.
Red smiles and decides to oblige.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230384936503.gif[/img]

Red snags the tarp with his cane and prepares to hop to the ground in order to tear the whole thing down.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230385215927.gif[/img]

Red jumps, tearing the nails from the walls and ripping the fabric into useless pieces.
The tarp comes down.

Red begins to laugh.
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230385314398.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230385850056.gif[/img]

Ruby stares at the horrible sight before her.
Red's laughter echoes through the small room.
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230386581823.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230386662355.gif[/img]

Red stopped laughing.

p.c: Ruby: CHOP THAT BITCH IN HALF
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230386919632.gif[/img]

Ruby's not going to attack another innocent survivor! Besides, Red's been helpful so far.

p.c: Ruby: Is there a fish on the wall?
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230387269174.gif[/img]

A drawing of one, yes.

p.c: Ruby: Is that a mask on his head?
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230387269174.gif[/img]

No. There are grisly surgical scars all across the corpse's face and exposed flesh.

He seems to be holding something.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230387566542.gif[/img]

Red says he is bored.
Red leaves the room.

p.c: Ruby: Examine text on wall.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230387566542.gif[/img]

Ruby can't make out any of the scrawled red writing by the body, or any of the strange diagrams marked around it.

p.c: Ruby: Grab the cross thingy from the corpse.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230387868863.gif[/img]

Ruby grabs the CROSS PEG.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230387868863.gif[/img]

The body on the wall grabs Ruby's arm.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230388717628.gif[/img]

[color=#800000]"Ruby."[/color]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230389234421.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230389314909.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3252815/images/1230389359201.gif[/img]

part 3 chapter 4

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230389530244.gif[/img]

Ruby is
somewhere

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230389770075.gif[/img]

TOM is here

p.c: Ruby: Say hello.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230389956617.gif[/img]

Ruby says hello.
Tom says hello back.
Tom says his eye hurts.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230390219078.gif[/img]

RED is here.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230390252237.gif[/img]

Red is holding a wooden disc.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Red to help examine Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230390499009.gif[/img]

Red says he is very, very tired of you asking.
Red cuts ??? with the WOODEN DISC

p.c: Ruby:
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230390831534.gif[/img]

Red is TWO COINS fishtank
Gas is seeping into the room
Vial ??? TOM
Ruby tries RUBBER GLOVES access ??? doorway button

p.c: Ruby: WAKE UP
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230391451942.gif[/img]

This isn't real.
