[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230391531648.gif[/img]

Ruby is in the dummy room.

p.c: Ruby: Inventory.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230391640829.gif[/img]

Ruby's inventory feels lighter.

p.c: Ruby: Use eye disc on wall circle.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230391880642.gif[/img]

Ruby doesn't have the eye disc.

Ruby picks up the CROSS PEG from where she was just standing.

p.c: Ruby: Exit.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230392703544.gif[/img]

Ruby exits the dummy room.


TOM is here.

p.c: End PART 3.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3253307/images/1230392907649.gif[/img]

And that's it for tonight, folks. 

I know this session was shorter than the others, and lighter on puzzles, but next time there will be more than enough to make up for the recent lack.

It's almost 8 AM and I'm exhausted, thanks for bearing with me and I hope you've enjoyed the ride so far.

Until next time.

p.c: Begin PART 4.
p.b:
Part 4, Chapter 1.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230716478393.gif[/img]

Ruby re-emerges into the room with the cell.

TOM is here.

p.c: Ruby: Greet Tom. Ask if he's seen Red. Ask how his eye and stomach are feeling.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230716811146.gif[/img]

Tom says his stomach is feeling much better, but his eye is in severe pain.

He doesn't know who "Red" is... but he does say that if you mean that person who keeps smiling, yes, he saw him.
Red let Tom out of the room he was trapped in, just a few minutes ago. Tom came out to look for Ruby.

Tom is glad to see Ruby. He says he thought she might be dead.

p.c: Ruby: Ask to look at Tom's eye.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230717002389.gif[/img]

Tom hesitantly agrees to let Ruby take a look at his eye.
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230717193230.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230717424892.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230717531962.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230717660604.gif[/img]

Tom shakes Ruby gently by the shoulder.
He asks if she is okay -- she just sort of blanked on him for a moment there.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom to walk to the other side of the room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230717876946.gif[/img]

Tom tells Ruby there's no way he's walking across the room, as he doesn't want to fall into the gap.

Tom tells Ruby she must not have noticed it. He says it's understandable, since she obviously hasn't been here for a while.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom what's happened in the time she's been gone.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230718069619.gif[/img]

Tom explains he's not sick anymore. He took an antidote three days ago. 
He hasn't seen much, since he's been locked in a room, but he says that he's been hearing loud creaking and cracking noises echoing from other rooms.

p.c: Ruby: Tell Tom to show you where he's been locked up.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230718279454.gif[/img]

Tom agrees, and leads Ruby up the access hatch.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230718440147.gif[/img]

...that's funny.
Tom says this doorway was just open.

p.c: Ruby: Examine room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230718797000.gif[/img]

There's a utilitarian metal hamper here. Something is inside. Ruby decides to get it. One moment.
There's a pit in the center of the room, spattered with dried blood. Sitting in the center is a scrap of paper. Ruby will pick that up in just a second, too.

The hatch in the southeast corner has a ladder, and looking down, it appears to lead into the cell room below. Something about that fact seems odd.

The corner has some sort of strange, smooth organic growth latched onto two walls and the floor. 
It looks almost like skin.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230719070108.gif[/img]

Ruby picks up a SCRAP OF PAPER from the shallow pit.
Ruby finds a FOOTY SOCK PAJAMA FOOT in the hamper, evidently torn from a full set of pajama bottoms and tied off at about the ankle. It's slightly heavy.

p.c: Ruby: Untie footie pajama, dump out possible contents with care.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230719221526.gif[/img]

Inside the FOOTY SOCK PAJAMA FOOT, there is a BLACK AND WHITE key.

Ruby throws away the FOOTY SOCK PAJAMA FOOT. Her genre instinct tells her she won't need it.

p.c: Ruby: Examine fleshy growth.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230719415754.gif[/img]

It's smooth and fleshy. It's like skin.

p.c: Ruby: Crawl down southeastern hatch.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230719415754.gif[/img]

The second hatch now has a ladder leading down. That wasn't there before.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230719584898.gif[/img]

Ruby descends the access hatch and enters the room below.

p.c: Ruby: Pull the lever.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230720587424.gif[/img]

Ruby tries to pull the lever, but something's locking it from moving. It looks like part of the mechanism is missing, like a thin metal rod. About the size of a toothpick.

p.c: Ruby: Tie the string around the lever and exit the room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230720772125.gif[/img]

Ruby ties a small bit of string to the lever, then climbs back up to the room where she first awoke. Tom is still here, looking the door over in confusion.

p.c: Ruby: Ask how Tom is doing. Ask how his eye is feeling.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230721030725.gif[/img]

Tom says his eye still hurts.

Or rather, it hurts where it's supposed to be.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230721267908.gif[/img]

Tom explains that he lost his eye while he was being dragged off to the room he spent the last few days in. The thing that brought him there did it.
Ruby must just not have noticed, between her flashes and distractions.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom to describe the "thing" that brought him here.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230721267908.gif[/img]

Unfortunately, Tom says he didn't get a good look at whatever dragged him away. He was already sick.
He says most of the pain of his eye has gone away by now.

p.c: Ruby: Hug Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230721577879.gif[/img]

Poor Tom's lost his eye. Ruby hugs him for comfort.

p.c: Ruby: Explain everything that happened to you.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230721888039.gif[/img]

Tom looks like he feels better.

Ruby tells Tom what's happened. Tom explains he's been weak and despondent lately, and unfortunately can't help her with many details, except that the western door in the room with the big console (the one that the fishtank-door leads to) is the way into the room he was trapped in.

They both agree that the only thing to do now is go forward.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Explore what was once the Z-Hatch.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230722145140.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby both go back down the access hatch to check the z-hatch. 

Also, there is a hook on the ground here -- but it is not sharp, and it is riveted firmly to the ground. It's essentially just a heavy-duty eyehook.

p.c: Ruby: Examine the symbol above the Z-Hatch.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230722302271.gif[/img]

Ruby has a feeling she's seen this before somewhere.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Examine the black panel thingy. Then, go through the Z-Hatch.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230722411903.gif[/img]

It's some sort of movable wall panel, but it won't budge. It must be remotely-controlled.
Ruby and Tom both head through the Z-Hatch.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230722650371.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom emerge in the back room.

In the small closet to the east, on a shelf, there is a large metal safe. Instead of a combination lock, it has a spherical indentation about as big as Ruby's fist, like a socket.

The room is also quite clean.

p.c: Ruby: Examine room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230722650371.gif[/img]

The shelves are bare. The lightbulb is on, looking unremarkable and harsh. The lock is simply a spherical indentation -- there's nothing more significant about the socket to speak of. That's all there is to it.

p.c: Ruby: Use key on safe.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230722882841.gif[/img]

Ruby uses the BLACK AND WHITE KEY on the WALL CABINET.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230723116861.gif[/img]

Inside the wall cabinet, Ruby finds another PAPER SCRAP.
She also recovers an old-fashioned, black leather MEDICINE BAG.

p.c: Ruby: Open medicine bag.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230723292489.gif[/img]

Ruby can't open the MEDICINE BAG.
There's a TINY PADLOCK of surprising strength keeping it closed.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Go east.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230723535737.gif[/img]

Ruby heads WEST (remember, the view was reversed on entering the back room) and -- now that the hatch is much larger -- she is able to take Tom with her into the side room behind the couch.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom to put his hand in the water tank, press the button on it.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230723892511.gif[/img]

Considering it's a GIANT BLENDER, Ruby decides not to ask Tom to put his hand inside.

p.c: Ruby: Examine everything. Note all differences.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230723892511.gif[/img]


The window between the rooms is now sealed with a heavy plastic, perhaps to avoid breaking.

The electrical panel has been covered up by a protective plate and marked with the symbol for electricity.

There is an electrical outlet visible here.

p.c: Ruby: Open the hatch under the window.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230724157299.gif[/img]

The mail-slot style drawer between the rooms, which Ruby has used before, is now empty. It's also clean.

p.c: Ruby: Examine 3 thingy.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230724157299.gif[/img]

The symbol looks familiar. Ruby remembers seeing that one, too.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Head back to dummy room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230724364885.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom head back to the now-bisected room, and then the Dummy room.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230724364885.gif[/img]

As soon as Ruby re-enters the bisected room, the Z-Hatch inexplicably slams shut. Tom is sealed on the opposite side of the wall from Ruby.

p.c: Ruby: Go upstairs, enter Z-Hatch code.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230724902396.gif[/img]

Ruby returns upstairs...

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230725090144.gif[/img]

The person behind the door tosses a small, thin metal rod onto the floor.

The door closes suddenly.

Ruby recovers the THIN METAL ROD.

p.c: Ruby: Check on Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230725090144.gif[/img]

Ruby can't check on Tom! He's sealed behind the Z-Hatch... and the terminal isn't working! It won't even light up!

p.c: Ruby: Put metal rod into lever.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230725330806.gif[/img]

Ruby climbs down...
...and replaces the metal rod into the lever.

p.c: Ruby: Pull.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230725516006.gif[/img]

Ruby pulls the lever up...
...only to find it has far more slack than she realized!

Something in the room moves in response to the pulling of the lever, but Ruby can't really see it from here.

p.c: Ruby: Release.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230725711894.gif[/img]

Ruby releases the lever, and it snaps back up (down?) into place. Something in the room moves, again.

p.c: Ruby: Tie it to one of the rungs of the ladder with the string.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230725862821.gif[/img]

The thick cord easily snaps the flimsy string.

p.c: Ruby: Push the 2nd button from the top.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230725862821.gif[/img]

Ruby attempts to press the second button from the top...
but it's been mashed in and broken! It looks like someone struck it hard with something. Or else they don't know their finger strength.

p.c: Ruby: Bring the lever up the ladder with you.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230726155894.gif[/img]

Ruby heads upstairs...
There sure is a lot of slack here.

p.c: Ruby: Hook lever to eyehook.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282166/images/1230726300286.gif[/img]

Ruby hooks the lever's handle onto the eyehook.

p.c: Ruby: Examine what was once a black panel.
p.b:
Part 4, Chapter 2.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230726543166.gif[/img]

Ruby retrieves the CROWBAR.

p.c: Ruby: Pry open Z-Hatch.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230726996759.gif[/img]

The thick metal shutters on the Z-Hatch are WAY too strong for Ruby to pry open!

p.c: Ruby: Smash open little metal lock.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230726996759.gif[/img]

The lock is surprisingly resilient, but Ruby knew this already. Maybe it's not so surprising.

p.c: Ruby: Use crowbar on boarded up hole.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230726996759.gif[/img]

Ruby RAPIDLY returns to the boarded-up hole, but she's not strong enough to pry the boards free! Her GIRLISH FIGURE is just not up to the task. She very rapidly returns to the other side -- how considerate of her!

p.c: Ruby: Go to the room to the left.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230726996759.gif[/img]

Ruby heads west!

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230727192973.gif[/img]

Ruby enters the Dummy room.

p.c: Ruby: Try to remove rope from dummy.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230727192973.gif[/img]

Ruby tried before. She just can't manage it.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect new plaque.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230727493894.gif[/img]

There is some sort of large black-and-white painting on the wall.
Beneath it, there is a plaque in a language Ruby cannot understand.

p.c: Ruby: Check thing under the mail slot.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230727912254.gif[/img]

It appears to be a BUTTON DIAGRAM, similar to the one that was upstairs in the control room.
It seems to have a different layout... perhaps it coincides with the one in the other room somehow?

p.c: Ruby: Crowbar on jammed filing cabinet.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230728281807.gif[/img]

Luckily, the cabinet is not jammed very hard, and the crowbar makes short work of it! Inside, Ruby finds a TINY KEY!

p.c: Ruby: Tiny key on medicine bag.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230728506189.gif[/img]

The MEDICINE BAG doesn't have anything that would help Tom inside anyway...

Ruby unlocks it with the TINY KEY and recovers a PAPER SCRAP and a VERY SHARP SCALPEL.

p.c: Ruby: Check deposit box again.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230728506189.gif[/img]

The deposit box is still empty.

p.c: Ruby: Check the 'clock' on the wall.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230728682443.gif[/img]

Nothing has changed.

p.c: Ruby: Check the sink.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230728776393.gif[/img]

The faucet still doesn't work. There's no water at all.

p.c: Ruby: Scalpel on biological growth in locker room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230728965452.gif[/img]

Ruby returns to the locker room.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230729148592.gif[/img]

Ruby does her best to carve away at the fleshy growth, and uncovers the cubbyhole behind it.

p.c: Ruby: Examine eye.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230729148592.gif[/img]

The eyeball, though strangely oversized, is not nearly as big as Ruby's fist. It won't fit in the spherical safe-lock.

Uncomfortably, Ruby picks up the eye and stores it away.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230729454454.gif[/img]

Ruby cleverly CONDENSES HER INVENTORY.

p.c: Ruby: Examine panel on wall.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230729655474.gif[/img]

It's a 4-digit password panel. Above it is a diagram of a happy fish. It appears to be powered down at the moment.  Attached to it is an EXTENDABLE POWER CORD.

p.c: Ruby: Get pulling and see how far this sucker goes.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230729894157.gif[/img]

Ruby pulls the cord to the furthest location she can walk to. 
Looks like there's plenty of slack.

p.c: Ruby: Knock on window.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230729999146.gif[/img]

TOM arrives on the other side of the thick window.

p.c: Ruby: Try to pass extension cord through mail slot.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230730158073.gif[/img]

That would never work! The mail slot is specifically designed to only open to one side of the wall at a time!

p.c: Ruby: Send the eye to Tom. Ask if it's his.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230730303238.gif[/img]

That's terrible! Even if the eye was his, it's past the point where it could be reattached even if there WERE proper medical facilities available.
Ruby is not so cruel as to do that to Tom for no reason.

p.c: Ruby: Smash the window with the crowbar.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230730303238.gif[/img]

The thick window is made of some sort of very resilient plexiglass. It refuses to give.

p.c: Ruby: Pry open DO NOT OPEN box.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230730863612.gif[/img]

This box is sealed tight!
Ruby's GIRLISH FIGURE isn't enough to force the DO NOT OPEN box open.

p.c: Tom: Inventory check.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/@mspfa-archive/discord/attachments/277259751929282563/314038948039229441/image.png[/img]

Sadly, this time Tom is carrying nothing. No tap, no canopener, no condoms.

p.c: Ruby: Send Tom the crowbar.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230731097213.gif[/img]

Ruby sends the CROWBAR to Tom through the drop slot.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230731299774.gif[/img]

Tom receives the CROWBAR!

With this weapon of potential destruction, Tom feels his MANLINESS surging back! His MANLY PHYSIQUE is at its peak! He poses triumphantly to celebrate.

Tom feels like he could do some serious bashing here, at least, to most things that aren't SPECIFICALLY DESIGNED TO STAND UP TO BASHING.

p.c: Tom: Inspect eye in Z-Room closely.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230731486825.gif[/img]

It's just a painting. Tom doesn't see anything particularly destroyable about it.

p.c: Tom: Pry off lightning-bolt panel.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230731696875.gif[/img]

Tom would rather not be electrocuted by prying off the panel on the HIGH VOLTAGE panel in the other room!

p.c: Tom: Destroy the bank-teller shelf.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230731696875.gif[/img]

It's the only thing that allows Tom and Ruby to pass items! They may need it!

p.c: Tom: Go through the Z-Hatch.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230731696875.gif[/img]

What are you talking about? It's obviously closed. Stop getting Tom's hopes up.

p.c: Tom: Smash up the shelves. Mind the light.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230731846846.gif[/img]

Fuck yeah!
Tom goes to work smashing up the shelves for no good reason, and carefully avoids breaking the lightbulb.

Then he decides what the heck and smashes the lightbulb anyway. It's very satisfying.

p.c: Tom: Smash sofa.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230732112436.gif[/img]

Tom's anti-inanimate-object bloodlust has subsided.
Besides, the couch is so utilitarian nothing about smashing it would probably be any fun.

p.c: Tom: Pry open Z-Hatch.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230732269754.gif[/img]

The Z-HATCH is so strong it severed that monster in half earlier. Tom's efforts would be wasted against its thick steel shutters.

p.c: Tom: Pry painting off of the wall.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230732516577.gif[/img]

You guys are really reaching!
The painting won't come off. It's inset INTO the wall.

p.c: Tom: Smash the airvent.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230732651189.gif[/img]

NO

p.c: Tom: Many, many stupid ideas.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230732889731.gif[/img]

i give up

p.c: Tom: Be Ruby.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230733163374.gif[/img]

RUBY DECIDES TO GET OFF HER FLUFFY WHITE BUTT AND GOES TO THE BUTTONS AGAIN

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230733326776.gif[/img]

Which button should Ruby press?
Think carefully -- pressing random buttons may not be wise.

Ruby is pretty sure she remembers seeing a DIAGRAM earlier.

p.c: Ruby: Top button.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230733499696.gif[/img]

Are you SURE?

Okay... but don't say you weren't warned.

Ruby presses the TOP BUTTON.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230733594228.gif[/img]

Ruby hears soft, distant sounds of running water.
Nothing else seems to happen.

p.c: Ruby: Button 4.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230733701166.gif[/img]

Ruby taps button 4. There's a loud rumbling sound from somewhere in another room, but otherwise, no visible change.

p.c: Ruby: Check on Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3282869/images/1230733924922.gif[/img]

Ruby decides to return to check on Tom.

He's okay, but there's a weird clanking sound nearby, like something moving around in metal.

Part 4, Chapter 3.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230734156095.gif[/img]

Ruby tells Tom she's pressed some buttons.
Tom says a minute or two ago, something started making noises from the pipe overhead. Every 30 seconds or so, a clanking, clattering sound echoes in the pipes, like something's passing through there.

p.c: Tom: Break open the pipe.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230734368999.gif[/img]

The pipes here are all shielded with thick metal plates.
Tom wisely moves to the back room, where the pipe is exposed.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230734368999.gif[/img]

Tom lets fly with the crowbar and assaults the old pipe!

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230734638142.gif[/img]

For better or for worse, the pipe is smashed wide open.

Just in time... the rumbling sound is coming this way again.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230734750209.gif[/img]

A perfect glass sphere comes tumbling down the shaft and lands softly, unharmed, on the soft yet utilitarian couch.

p.c: Tom: Sphere into socket, Sphere on safe, etc. etc.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230734915693.gif[/img]

Tom doesn't know quite what you're trying to say. Do you want him to UNLOCK THE SAFE WITH THE GLASS SPHERE?

Well gee, why didn't you just come out and say that?

Tom unlocks the safe using the GLASS SPHERE and the SAFE LOCK SOCKET.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230735043872.gif[/img]

Inside the safe, Tom finds... some sort of peculiar wooden disc.

p.c: Tom: Pass strange disc to Ruby.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230735244048.gif[/img]

Tom passes the strange disc to Ruby, who looks a bit startled to see it.

p.c: Ruby: Disc into circular diagram.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230735457033.gif[/img]

Ruby sets the wooden disc onto the peg in the clock-like device.
It fits perfectly.

To which symbol should Ruby point the disc?

p.c: Ruby: North.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230735635267.gif[/img]

Ruby points the dial disc to the top symbol. The sound of sliding metal comes from nearby.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230735860050.gif[/img]

Just as Ruby had hoped, the symbol must have opened the Z-Hatch!
TOM enters the room, looking pleased to see Ruby.
He carries the EXTENDABLE POWER CORD Ruby forgot in the other room.

p.c: Ruby: Hug Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230736166801.gif[/img]

Ruby hugs Tom.

Tom goes a step further.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230736462558.gif[/img]

...Ruby returns to the clock.

She turns the dial away from the top symbol, and she can hear the Z-Hatch slam down again.

p.c: Ruby: Dial to bottom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230736658126.gif[/img]

Ruby turns the dial to the bottom symbol. A faint sound of sliding metal can be heard through the plexiglass.

p.c: Ruby: Turn the dial back to the top. Go to the other side, leave Tom behind, ask Tom to turn the dial to the bottom again.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230736973715.gif[/img]

Ruby uses the dial to open the Z-Hatch and heads towards the room on the other side of the glass.
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230737053204.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230737191892.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230737358026.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230737530500.gif[/img]

Ruby's head
is killing her.
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230737734965.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230737976209.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230738138282.gif[/img]

Ruby wipes the blood off her forehead.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230738276126.gif[/img]

Tom didn't see.

p.c: Ruby: Show Tom that you are not well.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230738396736.gif[/img]

no

tom 
can't know

p.c: Ruby: Get Tom's attention.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230738396736.gif[/img]

Ruby gets Tom's attention, then gets him to switch the dial to the bottom long enough for her to open the small slot in the wall and retrieve the fourth PAPER SCRAP. She signals Tom, and he switches it back again, opening the Z-Hatch.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230738752502.gif[/img]

Ruby returns to the Dummy room.
Tom begins to apologize for his earlier rash action. Ruby quickly dismisses it.

It's fine.
Don't worry about it.

p.c: Tom: Go and plug in keypad.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230739014446.gif[/img]

Ruby re-opens the Z-Hatch. Tom returns through it to the other side and plugs in the EXTENDABLE POWER CORD from the digital lock upstairs.

p.c: Ruby: Go upstairs, enter 7935 in the keypad.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230739228120.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom return to the top level and enter the code into the powered-up terminal.

This is IT!

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230739330323.gif[/img]

...not quite as planned.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Solve this problem.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230739566880.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby make a boring excursion back downstairs, through the Z-Hatch, unplug the cord, pull it back to the proper side, change the dial to the symbol in the water, then climb back upstairs. 
But it's very boring so let's just skip all that and get to the good part. It's what Ruby would want. She doesn't mess around.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Step through into the darkness.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230739859710.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby prepare themselves...
but there's no one on the other side.

The monitor system appears to have been destroyed.

p.c: Ruby: Use cross peg on cross-shaped recess.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230740007902.gif[/img]

Ruby finally inserts the CROSS PEG into the cross-shaped recess in the wall.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3283419/images/1230740164254.gif[/img]

The panel on the wall transforms before Ruby's eyes, folding open and revealing a small ladder of broad pegs, leading up to a newly-opened hatch in the ceiling.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Ascend.
p.b:
Part 4, Chapter 4.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230740630771.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom climb the ladder up the new hatch in the ceiling.

It is no mystery whose home this is.

p.c: Ruby: Analyze object under tent thing, then fresh blood on the wall.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230740967837.gif[/img]

There's a CEREAL BOX under Red's tent.
On the wall, among endless scrawls of illegible, fevered writings, there's some sort of crude, arcane circular diagram, and in the center, a relatively-fresh bloodstain, probably from some time in the last few days.
Looks like someone hit their head here. Very hard.

p.c: Ruby: Open cereal box.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230741139688.gif[/img]

There is a very sugary cereal inside, but there's very little left. Something rattles inside the box, which promises a PRIZE INSIDE.

p.c: Ruby: Claim prize.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230741512805.gif[/img]

Something falls to the floor, amid Red's fevered writings, from the CEREAL BOX.

p.c: Ruby: Examine prize.
p.b: [img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230741694438.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230741735668.gif[/img]

They're teeth, all right.

Ruby pockets the HANDFUL OF TEETH.

p.c: Tom: Show Ruby where you came from.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230741957052.gif[/img]

Tom explains he was trapped behind this door.
Red let him out, so Red must be in there now.

The door is locked, but Red is on the other side.
He might let them in, Tom suggests.
After all, he let Tom out.

p.c: Tom: Knock on the door.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230742199046.gif[/img]

Tom knocks.
RED'S voice comes from the other side, raspy and strangely excited.

[color=red][b]
"HOLD ON NOW, FRIENDS.
RED CAN'T LET JUST ANYONE THROUGH THIS DOOR.
YOU HAVE TO PROVE YOU'RE FAMILY.
PART OF 
RED'S 
SPECIAL FAMILY."[/color][/b]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230742412016.gif[/img]

[b][color=red]"IF YOU WANT TO PROVE YOU'RE PART OF RED'S VERY
SPECIAL
FAMILY

YOU'LL HAVE TO SOLVE THIS RIDDLE FOR ME:

'I WATCH, I TEAR
I DEVOUR, AND BLEED

ALL THESE FALL,
AS LIQUID, TO FEED.'

NOW, WHY DON'T YOU GO BRING GOOD OLD RED THE ANSWER?
AND PROVE YOU'RE PART OF RED'S SPECIAL FAMILY."[/color][/b]

p.c: Tom: Answer "An eye."
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230742680905.gif[/img]

[b][color=red]"WRONG!
NOW SCRAM!"[/color][/b]

p.c: Tom: Nothing to do now but to go downstairs with Ruby and open the DO NOT OPEN box.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230743029450.gif[/img]

Tom decides it's time to get down to business. Warning labels are for chumps.
Stand aside, ladies. It's time for MANLY PHYSIQUE to prove its worth, and damn the consequences!
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230743326627.gif[/img]

p.c: Ruby: See inside.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230743661726.gif[/img]

There is a dessicated corpse inside the box. Its skin has become paper-thin and yellowed, half-transparent, clinging to its thin skeleton.

It looks...
strangely familiar.

p.c: Tom: Look inside instead.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230744029117.gif[/img]

Tom finds something in the box.

Tom retrieves the BOWL OF CLAWED FINGERS.

p.c: Tom: Turn on the sink.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230744276045.gif[/img]

The faucet pours red liquid.
Actually, Tom's not that surprised.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom what's in the box.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230744402996.gif[/img]

Tom says a bowl of severed fingers is certainly disgusting, but no worse than some other things they've both seen.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Take ingredients to blender.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230744885391.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby head to the maintenance area and after a gruesome blending, they whip up the GODAWFUL SMOOTHIE.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Take smoothie to Red.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230745143784.gif[/img]

The door is already open.
Perhaps he knew Ruby and Tom were coming.
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230745922902.gif[/img]

p.c: End PART 4.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3284047/images/1230745994231.gif[/img]

~To be continued~

Thanks again for your patience, everyone.
I'll see you all again for the next installment.

p.c: Begin PART 5.
p.b:
Part 5, Chapter 1.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231238524634.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom enter the room Tom was trapped in earlier.
The walls are covered with graffiti. There are numerous items here, including a SHOVEL HEAD, EMPTY RED SPRAYCAN, Red's CANE, and the remnants of another implement broken to create one of the two stakes. There is a METAL BOX here.
The pneumatic tube here is empty.
There are doors to the north and to the south.

RED is here.

p.c: Ruby: Examine room. Tom: Open metal box.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231238669066.gif[/img]

Red's face is grotesquely deformed, with an impossibly huge grin.
Red is impaled through the back of his neck and through the right side of his skull by large stakes. Red is covered in blood and not moving. 
Red's dead, baby.

Ruby doesn't particularly want to disturb Red's body, let alone pull out thick wooden stakes jammed through his gray matter.

TOM examines the METAL BOX Red left. It appears unlocked, so he opens it.

p.c: Ruby: Look at the screen / window. Examine stuff around Red.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231238750974.gif[/img]

The screen is just static. 
Ruby examines the items. There is a METAL TOOL HEAD that looks like it broke off one of the two stakes, but it does not appear useful in its current broken state.

p.c: Tom: The box. Open it.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231238776164.gif[/img]

Tom opens the BOX. There is a NOTE.
Tom also notices a COIN in the pile of stuff under the note.

p.c: Ruby: Take some stuff.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231238812791.gif[/img]

Ruby takes the CANE and SHOVEL HEAD, but leaves the EMPTY SPRAYCAN and the METAL TOOL HEAD, as both appear unhelpful in their current state.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231238849928.gif[/img]

The door to the north opens.
A very large figure appears in the doorway.

Ruby gets the very distinct impression that this individual is not friendly.

p.c: Tom: Read the note.
p.b: [img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231238888368.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231238911687.gif[/img]

Tom discards the NOTE as he finishes reading.
There is something under the NOTE.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231239061259.gif[/img]

Suddenly, a flash of memory returns to Ruby.

The figure does not seem friendly.
She remembers the figure...

The figure is the one who put her in the locker.

p.c: Tom: Run out of the room at HIGH SPEED.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231239061259.gif[/img]

Ruby doesn't see the BOMB.
Tom reacts quickly and runs from the room. He grabs Ruby and quickly carries her along.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231239273825.gif[/img]

Tom runs as fast as his tired legs will carry him.
[CUTSCENE!]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231239565010.gif[/img]

Tom leaps from the room just as a huge, poorly-rendered explosion erupts from behind them.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231239816377.gif[/img]

The explosion blasts through the air above them, filling the room with heat.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231240059337.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom appear unharmed. The building around them still shudders from the explosion, but it appears the imminent danger is gone.
The room to the north appears to have been filled with debris. It is now inaccessible.
[CUTSCENE OVER]

p.c: Tom: Consider the strength of the bomb.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231240341482.gif[/img]

The explosion seems quite localized -- the door to the north is inaccessible, and most likely, the room the explosion took place in is all but obliterated, but it seems most of the other rooms are unaffected. The area as a whole does not seem to have had a particularly strong reaction.

p.c: Ruby: Thank Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231240341482.gif[/img]

Ruby thanks Tom for saving her life again.
Tom blushes slightly. He says it's what anyone would have done in that situation.

p.c: Ruby: What about your two coins?
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231240566337.gif[/img]

It would appear Red used the TWO COINS as some kind of makeshift contacts for his homemade bomb.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231240566337.gif[/img]

The lights in the room suddenly go out.

p.c: Ruby: Look at the tiny light outline.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231240896299.gif[/img]

There seems to be a doorway hidden in the wall. A light comes through a crack from the other side. Perhaps the door was jarred loose in the explosion.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Weapons out, and listen.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231240896299.gif[/img]

The air is deathly silent after the near-deafening explosion.
Ruby and Tom draw their SCALPEL and CROWBAR, respectively.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom if he recognized the birdman. See if you can remember anything more yourself.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231241052841.gif[/img]

Ruby is drawing a blank, beyond the image of being put into the metal cell by the figure.
Tom says he recognizes them. It is the same figure that dragged him away to that room when he was suffering from arsenic poisoning.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: See how the other rooms have changed from the blast.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231241328455.gif[/img]

A preliminary examination of the room below suggests there has been no extraneous damage, but the lights seem to be off in most of the rooms.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Go to dummy room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231241494117.gif[/img]

There doesn't appear to be any damage here either.

p.c: Tom: Examine dummy's glowing eyes.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231241720973.gif[/img]

Tom examines the glowing eyes on the dummy. He can't tell what's causing the light.

Ruby gets scared and backs away from the dummy.

p.c: Ruby: Get a grip and stay the FUCK away from that box.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231241997838.gif[/img]

Ruby can't resist... she looks in the box.

The box is empty.

p.c: Tom: Poke dummy in the eye.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231241997838.gif[/img]

Tom uses the sharp end of the crowbar instead, and jabs one of the eyes.
It makes a squishy sound.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Get out.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231242221804.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby decide to quickly vacate the room.
They head back upstairs.

p.c: Tom: Crowbar the door open.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231242426005.gif[/img]

Tom grabs his CROWBAR and sets to work opening the door. It's stuck fast, but nothing a little MANLY PHYSIQUE can't handle...

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231242583484.gif[/img]

The door unceremoniously falls off its hinges and reveals a bright room beyond.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Step through into the light.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231242887392.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom check the room for obvious dangers, take a moment to let their eyes adjust, and then enter...

There is a door to the west. The door to the north seems to lead to the room where Red's body was just found. It is inaccessible due to debris.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Examine room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231243211900.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby inspect the room.
There is a bottle of CHAMPAGNE on the table. Tom takes it.
There is a NOTE on the other table. Ruby will inspect that in just a moment.
On the north wall is the doorway to the room the bomb went off in. The heavy door has been blown to pieces but seemed to protect this room rather well from the blast. The doorway is marked "Holding" by a sign above it.

There is a WATER COOLER here.
Beside the cooler, there is a set of METAL SHUTTERS, which are wrapped shut at the base with barbed wire.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Drink some water.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231243211900.gif[/img]

Strangely, neither Tom nor Ruby is very thirsty.

p.c: Ruby: Examine hole below the vent.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231243573664.gif[/img]

There appears to be something in the back of the hole, but it's wedged in there good! Ruby can't get it out with her bare hands, she'd need some kind of precise implement to grab it.

p.c: Ruby: Read the note on the table.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231243727694.gif[/img]

Ruby examines the NOTE. It appears to be some kind of official document. Much of the text has been blotted out with a marker.
[Cutscene!]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231244263276.gif[/img]

This note...

...it's about Ruby!

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231244694834.gif[/img]

The note is mostly illegible.
Something has been attached to the main note, however.
[End cutscene.]

p.c: Ruby: Tom mustn't know.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231244904237.gif[/img]

Tom can't see this.
Ruby hides the note in her pocket.

p.c: Ruby: Get that object with either the crowbar or the cane.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231245204568.gif[/img]

It won't work, the hole narrows at the end, and whatever's in there is wedged. It would need to be pulled out, and neither the cane nor the crowbar can GRAB.

Tom offers to open the bottle of CHAMPAGNE with Ruby.

p.c: Ruby: Tell Tom that champagne can wait.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231245490115.gif[/img]

Tom agrees. He was just trying to be upbeat.
The champagne will taste all the better when they're out of here.

Ruby inspects the objects on the wall. She finds, on the shelf, two WALKIE-TALKIES. Both Tom and Ruby take one.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Examine doors.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3326334/images/1231245863688.gif[/img]

The metal shutters are bound tight with the coiled barbed wire. No amount of force from the crowbar will rip them free, and they can't be untied or unwound -- not with bare hands, at least.

The door to the north, leading to the bombed-out room, is completely blocked with debris. Even Tom's manly physique wouldn't be able to clear a path.

The stained wooden door to the west is locked. It appears to have a lock which is linked to the adjacent card reader.

p.c: Tom: Smash the door to the west.
p.b:
Part 5, Chapter 2.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231246119689.gif[/img]

The card-key-locked wooden door is no match for Tom and his crowbar!
Take THAT, logical progression of puzzles!

The door turns to splinters.

p.c: Tom: Look into room before going in.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231246385577.gif[/img]

A spiral staircase leads upwards.

p.c: Ruby: Scold Tom for such harsh actions.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231246385577.gif[/img]

Actually, she's pretty impressed.
Ruby compliments Tom for his harsh actions.
Tom seems pleased.

p.c: Ruby: Yell upstairs.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231246611805.gif[/img]

There's light coming from upstairs, but after Ruby calls, there's no response.

Tom shivers warmly, as an after-effect of his RUSH OF MANLINESS.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Set your walkie-talkies to another frequency.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231246814417.gif[/img]

A clever idea! Tom and Ruby set a new frequency together to avoid being listened in on.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Wasn't there an entrance to RED's hideout?
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231247106463.gif[/img]

The room with Red's hideout and the monitors is blocked by a collapse of debris! Both that room and the room with the bomb are inaccessible, at least for now!

The consensus seems to be either to go upstairs or go to the boarded-up hole in the other room.
Who should go where? Remember, now that they have walkie-talkies they can split up and work faster while staying in touch!

WHAT SHOULD THEY DO?

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Split up.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231247293963.gif[/img]

With their WALKIE TALKIES in hand, the two split up. While Tom goes off to pry up the boards, Ruby heads upstairs.

Because the staircase curved around, this new room is directly above the room Ruby and Tom were just in.

p.c: Ruby: Look at the fetus thing.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231247820858.gif[/img]

There is a fancy glass display case here. Inside is a strange STATUE of polished, smooth green stone. It resembles some kind of almost fetal creature. It is very unsettling.
Inside the glass display case, there is also what appears to be a SEVERED FINGER.

p.c: Ruby: Tell Tom what you see.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231247820858.gif[/img]

Ruby reports her findings to Tom, who acknowledges them with concern. He tells Ruby to be careful.
Ruby promises.

p.c: Ruby: Examine room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231248211423.gif[/img]

Ruby examines the room:
There is a ladder leading up, with a sealed metal hatch at the top and no visible means of opening it.
There are two doors to the north, both with a symbol above them. 
There is a FRAMED PICTURE on the wall, with some sort of illegible, archaic writing on it.
To the east, there is a heavily-reinforced metal door with an inset card reader.

There are two PLAQUES on the display case.
The top one is illegible due to blood and rust. The second appears to be a request and/or warning label.
A key card slot is set just underneath this second plaque.

p.c: Ruby: Enter the door on the right.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231248500606.gif[/img]

The door on the right is unlocked. It opens into a small closet. On the north wall is a large glass-front installment, like a vending machine, filled with all manner of pills and medicinal vials.
There are two shelves here. On one shelf is a HIGH-TECH FIRST AID KIT. On the shelf above it is a PRESSURIZED OXYGEN TANK with an oxygen mask attached.

p.c: Ruby: Be Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231248659618.gif[/img]

Tom is making his way to the boards.
This room is very strange.

p.c: Ruby: Take things from the shelf.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231248887470.gif[/img]

Ruby takes both items and adds them to her growing inventory.
The first aid kit has a FINGERPRINT LOCK on it! How high-tech!

p.c: Tom: Experiment.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231249045697.gif[/img]

Tom begins breaking off the planks. He tosses one into the pit.

It doesn't come back.

p.c: Ruby: Break the vending machine.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231249280333.gif[/img]

The glass on the vending-machine device is too sturdy to be broken like that! Apparently whoever designed it expected that to happen.

There IS a small hole in the wall of the closet.

p.c: Tom: Pry the rest of the boards.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231249400589.gif[/img]

Tom finishes opening the hole down.
There is a distant light from the other end.

p.c: Ruby: Bump the vending machine.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231249572897.gif[/img]

Have you really never used a vending machine before? That won't work!

p.c: Ruby: Stick the cane into the hole.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231249572897.gif[/img]

Great.
It's stuck.

p.c: Tom: Go through the hole.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231249716377.gif[/img]

Tom arrives at the other end of the hatch.

Tom feels strangely turned around.

p.c: Tom: Radio Ruby.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231250000685.gif[/img]

Tom radios Ruby.
Ruby hears his transmission, but there's some sort of strange echo.
...perhaps he's nearby.

p.c: Tom: Examine fucking EVERYTHING.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231250000685.gif[/img]

There is a MEDICAL DIAGRAM on the wall above a stained MEDICAL EXAMINATION TABLE. On a small surface next to it is an ANATOMICAL EYE MODEL. 
Some sort of diagram is on the west wall. To the south, there is a locked door.
There are some papers on the EXAM TABLE.
There is also a SET OF MEDICAL TOOLS lying on the table.

p.c: Tom: Check upper northwest corner of room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231250108657.gif[/img]

It appears to be a camera.

p.c: Ruby: Check your third eye.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231249572897.gif[/img]

It hurts.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Get the cane free.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231250460071.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom, realizing they're somehow on opposite sides of the same wall, work together to free the cane.

p.c: Tom: Inspect desks, eye, diagram, etc.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231250687682.gif[/img]

Tom inspects the ANATOMICAL EYE MODEL, it's just a plastic standee model of an eyeball, like the kind they have in medical schools.
HOWEVER! When Tom picks it up, he finds a single COIN underneath the base, which he then pockets.

The DIAGRAM in the back is that of an eye with some sort of strange script annotating it. It seems very archaic.

Tom picks up the PAPERS on the exam table...
[CUTSCENE moment]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231251213423.gif[/img]

...Tom is not sure what to make of this letter.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231251583852.gif[/img]

There's an attached photograph at the end of the letter.

p.c: Tom: Give the coin to Ruby.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231251884516.gif[/img]

This is too much to take in right now. Tom hastily pockets the letter and the photo.
There will be time to sort this out later.

Tom shakily passes the coin to Ruby through the wall, thankful she can't see him like this.

p.c: Ruby: Use the coin on the vending machine.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3327479/images/1231252091464.gif[/img]

Ruby uses the vending machine and the coin to retrieve the GOLD KEY someone stashed there.
Ruby noticed the door from the room outside to the medical room Tom's in now was locked -- perhaps this is that key.

p.c: Ruby: Leave closet, unlock door to the medical room.
p.b:
Part 5, Chapter 3.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231252378300.gif[/img]

Ruby can't open the door from here, even if this IS the correct key.

The doorknob and lock on this side are stuffed and tightly wrapped with what appears to be...

hair.

p.c: Ruby: Re-enter closet, give key to Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231252659468.gif[/img]

Ruby slips the key through the hole in the wall.
It promptly falls down the shaft.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231252717898.gif[/img]

Ruby hears footsteps coming from outside the closet.

p.c: Tom: Go downstairs. Fetch the key.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231252914073.gif[/img]

Tom goes down the shaft to fetch the key.

The footsteps are still coming from just outside the closet.

p.c: Tom: Go downstairs. Fetch the key.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231252914073.gif[/img]

Tom goes down the shaft to fetch the key.

The footsteps are still coming from just outside the closet.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231253426075.gif[/img]

A figure appears in the doorway.

p.c: Ruby: Let your thoughts run around wildly.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231253655766.gif[/img]

RUBY IS SO CONFUSED.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231253937435.gif[/img]

Ruby demands to know who the figure is. Her voice is shaking, but she tries to sound confident.

She recognizes that face.
She's seen it twice before.
She just didn't realize it was the same one, until now.

p.c: Ruby: Ask him what his name is.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231254529345.gif[/img]

[color=#800000]"S--STITCHES"[/color]
Stitches recoils slightly. His sewn-up headwound head begins to bleed.

He staggers uneasily backwards, glancing at Ruby, confused.

[color=#800000]"H-h-h-how do I kn-kn-know you?!"[/color] he shrieks in a hoarse, rattling pitch.

p.c: Ruby: Click the button on your walkie-talkie twice, then, be Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231254851018.gif[/img]

Tom receives two bursts of static as he picks up the key.

...something very strange is happening in this room.

p.c: Tom: Be Ruby again.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231255149271.gif[/img]

Stitches pauses momentarily. His expression changes and his eyes widen as he stares at his own hand.

p.c: Ruby: Tell Stitches your name.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231255369160.gif[/img]

Ruby tells Stitches her name.

Stitches freezes. Again, he stutters.
[color=#800000]"H-HOW DO I KNOW Y--Y-Y-YOU?"[/color]

He appears to prepare an attack, then suddenly turns and flees from the closet, wailing a rattling moan.
[color=#800000]"STAY AWAY FROM ME,"[/color] he shrieks. [color=#800000]"I--I-I'LL ONLY HURT YOU!"[/color]

With that, Stitches is gone.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231255580740.gif[/img]

Tom hears the screaming and rushes back, key in hand.

p.c: Ruby: Go after Stitches.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231255954758.gif[/img]

Ruby nearly had a heart attack. She's not sure she could go after Stitches right now even if she wanted to. And she's not sure she wants to.

Tom unlocks the door.

p.c: Tom: Read diagram on wall.
p.b: [img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231256572432.gif[/img]

p.c: Tom: Clean up the diagram.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231256572432.gif[/img]

Unfortunately, it's soaked into the old print, rather than simply hanging around on the outside of it.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Reunite.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231257033246.gif[/img]

Tom unlocks the door. Tom and Ruby meet up again in the hall. 
Tom makes sure Ruby is okay. He reassures her things will be all right.

Ruby and Tom speak briefly. Tom explains the growing rift in the lower level. Ruby tells Tom about Stitches.

Tom reacts strangely to the name. 
When pressed, he explains he read it in a medical document.
"Stitches" was officially recorded as dead.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Head through the door on the right.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231257366865.gif[/img]

The reinforced door is locked with a magnetic keycard strip.

...something is beeping inside the FIRST AID KIT.
The closer Ruby gets to the keycard slot, the louder it gets.

p.c: Ruby: Share all of your secrets.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328222/images/1231257669615.gif[/img]

This is it. After that encounter with Stitches, Ruby knows she and Tom have to be 100% on the level. She can't keep it a secret anymore.

She and Tom sit down by the door and she tells him everything.
The documents about her own involvement in the study, labeling her "deceased", the visions of her own corpse, the injury she sustained from the abomination in the maintenance room, her encounters with Red...
Even her third eye.

She spills it all.
She tells him everything.

Part 5, Chapter 4.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231258071876.gif[/img]

Tom says as long as they're sharing secrets, there's something Ruby should know about, too.

p.c: Ruby: Open the beeping medical kit with the severed finger.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231258360734.gif[/img]

As unsettling as it is to realize each other's bizarre mutations, Ruby and Tom find a strange comfort in knowing they're both in this together now. If nothing else, they no longer have to fear each other, or hide secrets.

The FIRST AID KIT beeps louder whenever Ruby gets closer to the keycard-slot for the fitted on the big reinforced door.
But the FIRST AID KIT is locked with a fingerprint scanner!

p.c: Tom, Ruby: Try all of your fingers on the scanner.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231258665537.gif[/img]

None of their 28 combined fingers and thumbs work.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Examine the ladder going up.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231258665537.gif[/img]

It is capped with a sealed metal hatch and no visible means of opening.
It is covered in bolts (not buttons).

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Examine framed painting on wall.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231258665537.gif[/img]

It's a framed painting mounted on the wall.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: 2x inventory check combo.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231258969796.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby return downstairs and compare inventories.

p.c: Tom: Use MEDICAL TOOLS on hole.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231259288338.gif[/img]

Tom uses some forceps to reach deep into the hole in the wall, and retrieves yet another ACCESS CARD!

p.c: Ruby: Combine the shovel-head and the cane.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231259598202.gif[/img]

Ruby wedges the cane into the shovel head to create a BLUDGEONY CANESHOVEL!

p.c: Tom: Check behind the water cooler.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231260027750.gif[/img]

Tom sees something behind the water cooler.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231260050164.gif[/img]

Tom retrieves RED'S HAND.

It must have been blown here after the explosion.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231260503696.gif[/img]

So which will it be?
Do they go together to the handscanner downstairs with Red's hand? Or do they go together to the display case upstairs?

Or do they split up and do both at the same time?

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Hand scanner.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231260952007.gif[/img]

Consensus is on the handscanner.

Ruby and Tom descend to the lower levels, to find that power and lighting have returned.
Tom gives Ruby RED'S HAND, and she presses it to the scanner.
It beeps lightly, and a small light turns green.

[CUTSCENE!]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231261473815.gif[/img]

The machine boots up slowly, and provides a short prompt.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231261559063.gif[/img]

Some kind of video feed begins playing.
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231261746579.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231261746579.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231261932804.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231262025445.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231262080183.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231262324515.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231262665537.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231262877750.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231263067020.gif[/img]

The video ends.
[CUTSCENE END]

p.c: Ruby: It's okay to cry.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231263581639.gif[/img]

Tears will have to wait.

p.c: End PART 5.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3328813/images/1231263709322.gif[/img]

~End of part 5~

More to come.

Thanks as always for sticking with me.
Hope you enjoyed it.

See you next time, my dear Patients.

p.c: Begin PART 6.
p.b:
Part 6, Chapter 1.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231748519318.gif[/img]

The large figure stands in the doorway, blocking Tom and Ruby's exit.

p.c: Ruby: Try to talk to ♠, ask what he wants.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231748794883.gif[/img]

The figure enters the room, squeezing through the doorway. Ruby attempts to greet the figure, asking about its intentions, its identity.
The figure does not speak.

p.c: Tom: Shove the dummy into Ace.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231749141297.gif[/img]

The dummy is bolted down on a pivot.

p.c: Ruby: Offer Red's hand.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231749141297.gif[/img]

Ruby offers the dismembered hand. The figure doesn't seem to want it.

The figure approaches and reaches for Ruby.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Get ready to fight.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231749457669.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom are not going without a fight.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Evade as much as possible.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231749839860.gif[/img]

The figure lunges at Ruby, who ducks out of the way of its massive arms.
Tom dodges around.

p.c: Tom: Try to crowbar his knees.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231750354087.gif[/img]

Ruby bolts from the room while Tom drives the sharp end of the crowbar into the figure's leg.

p.c: Tom: Get out of here now.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231750650448.gif[/img]

Tom runs. The giant figure seems unphased.

p.c: Tom: Flee through the Z-Hatch.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231750918822.gif[/img]

Tom follows Ruby to the Z-Hatch.
The figure is right behind him.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231751126530.gif[/img]

Ruby helps Tom as he dives through the hatch.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231751431391.gif[/img]

There is a horrible sound of wrenching metal.
Large white hands are tearing the Z-Hatch open.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Climb pipe.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231751763733.gif[/img]

Ruby easily clambers up the pipe with her GIRLISH FIGURE.
Tom follows behind her.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Ascend.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231752041751.gif[/img]

TOM and RUBY ascend the narrow pipe, desperately clinging to the rusty walls.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231753281062.gif[/img]

TOM and RUBY emerge from the pipe after a long and winding climb. They feel very turned around.
They emerge in a new place they have never seen before.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Look at the monitor.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231753574886.gif[/img]

A large, shadowy face stares back.

p.c: Ruby: Ask the face to identify itself.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231754005359.gif[/img]

Ruby asks the face who it is.
The screen goes to static.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Examine room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231754005359.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom move on to explore the room.

This room is full of broken science equipment, including shattered beakers and tubes, a broken table in the southeast corner, and lots of spilled liquid. The room spells of chemical vapors.
Tom can see something vaguely through the steel vent, but it's too sturdy to bash down by brute force.
There are scraps and tatters of cloth at Tom's feet. They look like the remnants of a labcoat.
By a very LARGE CABINET (which is locked with a chain and padlock), Ruby finds a SEVERED FOOT on the ground, with minimal blood.
The door has no visible lock, but is wired to the MONITOR.
Ruby pockets the HEAVY GLOVES she finds on the floor.
Also of obvious note in this room is the ACCESS HATCH leading down, which is secured in place with some sort of STAFF.

p.c: Ruby: Take staff.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231754595161.gif[/img]

Ruby takes the ODD STAFF. It's made of some kind of green-stained wood.

p.c: Tom: Check on top of the cabinet.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231754595161.gif[/img]

Tom climbs up and takes the EMPTY SYRINGE.

p.c: Ruby: Attempt to pick cabinet lock.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231754595161.gif[/img]

Don't be silly! Neither Tom nor Ruby is CRAFTY enough to know how to pick locks!

p.c: Tom: Check the poster.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231754985992.gif[/img]

Tom removes the MEDICAL POSTER on the wall and discovers a small recess with a SHEAF OF PAPERS inside. He takes the papers and prepares to read them [automatic action upcoming].

p.c: Ruby: Examine vent.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231754985992.gif[/img]

Ruby examines the vent. There are tiny warnings that indicate it is used to channel gaseous chemicals and that gas masks should be used when operating the chemical pump, which is nowhere to be found.

p.c: Ruby: Examine hatch to room below.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231755084207.gif[/img]

While Tom prepares to read the note, Ruby looks through the hatch to the familiar lower level.

p.c: Tom: Read the notes.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231755457895.gif[/img]

Tom begins to read the sheaf of papers.

[cutscene]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231755715441.gif[/img]

Tom continues reading, sharing his findings with Ruby.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231756060534.gif[/img]

Tom is almost out of pages.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231756105217.gif[/img]

Tom reaches the last page in the pile of loose papers.
[end cutscene]

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Descend.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231756433433.gif[/img]

Ruby grabs a piece of TATTERED CLOTH.

Tom and Ruby uneasily put away the notes, unsure quite what to make of them, especially the last two entries. 
They head down the hatch into the hallway below.
Tom prepares to use the ACCESS CARD he got from the hole in the wall below.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231756520245.gif[/img]

As Tom feeds the access card into the slot, the glass cover on the display stand descends, revealing the STATUETTE and the SEVERED FINGER.

p.c: Ruby: Give Tom the first-aid kit.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231756942702.gif[/img]

Ruby gives Tom the FIRST AID KIT, which Tom unlocks with the SEVERED FINGER.

He empties it for its contents, which turn out to be:
A pair of WIRE CUTTERS
A ROLL OF GAUZE
And a STRANGE DISC of green-dyed wood. It looks like it was broken off of something.

p.c: Ruby: Combine the disc with the staff.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231757259845.gif[/img]

Ruby fits the two pieces of greenish wood together into an ODD STAFF.

p.c: Tom: Swipe the card on the display case again.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231757259845.gif[/img]

Tom re-seals the display case.

p.c: Ruby: Give Tom an eye-patch.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231757514166.gif[/img]

Ruby uses the GAUZE and TATTERED CLOTH to bandage Tom's eye.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Go downstairs. Tom: Cut the barbed wire with the wire cutters.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231757847546.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby go back downstairs, wary of any potential aggressors.
Tom uses the WIRE CUTTERS on the BARBED WIRE which is tangled so tightly around the SHUTTERS.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231758369131.gif[/img]

Behind the metal shutters is some kind of cabinet shelf for cafeteria food.

What's inside is not food.

p.c: Tom: Carefully retrieve the card.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3379271/images/1231758726907.gif[/img]

Tom carefully removes the card from the jaws of the severed head.

Tom pockets the HIGH-CLEARANCE ACCESS CARD.

Part 6, Chapter 2.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231759236313.gif[/img]

The large figure appears in the doorway again.
He appears armed.

p.c: Ruby: Hurry upstairs with Tom. Then, check inventory.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231759526684.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom run upstairs. The large figure follows in hot pursuit.
Tom runs to use the HIGH CLEARANCE ACCESS CARD on the door. 
Ruby and Tom take this opportunity to mentally review their respective inventories.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231759774612.gif[/img]

The large figure appears in the doorway. Tom is still opening the door.

p.c: Ruby: Throw the first-aid kit at the display case.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231759961053.gif[/img]

Ruby hurls the empty case as Tom finally gets the door open and rushes through.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231760133870.gif[/img]

The empty first aid kit smashes the glass on the security-protected display case.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231760529203.gif[/img]

Ruby rushes through the door after Tom as a lethal trap springs from the mechanical guts of the display case.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231761045450.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom quickly shut the door behind them and observe the new room.

p.c: Ruby: Examine jar. Tom: Examine note on wall.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231761445674.gif[/img]

Tom steps over a CHASM in the floor to approach the CLIPBOARD hanging on the wall.

Ruby inspects the JAR. Inside, some sort of very strange, fleshy growth is suspended in some kind of solution. It is covered in what looks like veins and knotted muscle.

p.c: Ruby: Look through chasm in floor.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231761761543.gif[/img]

...it would appear to be the room Ruby started in, when she first climbed out of her locker.

p.c: Tom: Read.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231762276859.gif[/img]

Tom grabs the CLIPBOARD and reads for yet another expository cutscene.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231762832882.gif[/img]

There are only two pages.

Tom gets the feeling there was some inter-departmental feuding going on here.

p.c: Tom: Check locker #5.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231763243552.gif[/img]

Tom tries Locker #5, but the lock, while busted, is jammed. It'll take a bit of force to rip open.
Ruby, meanwhile, examines the clipboard after Tom.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Check the goddamned wiring.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231763527823.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby consult each other on the wiring, but given the construction of the massive piece of machinery, they assume the wires and tubes are for normal operation. It does not APPEAR booby-trapped, as far as they can tell.

p.c: Ruby: Lend Tom the bludgeony caneshovel.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231763527823.gif[/img]

Ruby lends Tom her BLUDGEONY CANESHOVEL.
Tom promises to give it right back.

p.c: Ruby: Step away from that chasm.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231763688469.gif[/img]

Ruby retreats a safe distance from the hole.

p.c: Tom: Pop the locker open.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231763927502.gif[/img]

Tom springs the door open with a loud metallic rattle.

Locker #5 is empty.
However, something is scrawled onto the door.
In Tom's handwriting.
