[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231764257387.gif[/img]

Tom closes the locker quickly.
Ruby asks if Tom found anything useful inside.

She also wants to try opening locker #6 with the cane device.

p.c: Ruby: Green staff on locker.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231764724560.gif[/img]

Ruby opens Cell #6 by setting the ODD STAFF into the carved recess on the front of it.

Inside there is a large electrical switch labeled "2".

p.c: Ruby: Flip switch.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231764933434.gif[/img]

Ruby flips the switch, but nothing seems to happen.

Meanwhile, Tom examines the BUTTON on the wall.
SHOULD TOM PUSH THE SHINY BUTTON?
I WONDER WHAT THE PLAYERS WILL HAVE TO SAY

p.c: Tom: Do it. Press the shiny button.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231765226751.gif[/img]

Tom waits for Ruby to step away from the cells before pressing the BUTTON.

A panel opens up in the wall, revealing a PNEUMATIC TUBE.

A SEVERED HAND falls out of the pneumatic tube.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Take the hand back to the scanner.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231765518957.gif[/img]

Tom grabs the SEVERED HAND.

Might as well get going.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231765826149.gif[/img]

...this could be bad.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231766176844.gif[/img]

So far so good.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231766265879.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby return to the room with the handscanner.

p.c: Tom: Use hand, watch cutscene.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231766670810.gif[/img]

TOM scans the SEVERED HAND and begins the CUTSCENE as video playback initializes.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231767183526.gif[/img]

[Cutscene]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231767423035.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231767837126.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231768353468.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231768587276.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231768614130.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231768866876.gif[/img]

It appears there is more than one video queued up.
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231769118106.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231769291420.gif[/img]

Part 6, Chapter 3.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3380754/images/1231769568106.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3381692/images/1231769935864.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3381692/images/1231770117413.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3381692/images/1231770154910.gif[/img]
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3381692/images/1231770414578.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3381692/images/1231770468647.gif[/img]

The video finally ends.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3381692/images/1231770943716.gif[/img]

Tom backs away, clutching the caneshovel he forgot to return.

He seems angry.
He also seems very scared.

p.c: End PART 6.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3381692/images/1231771030404.gif[/img]

That's the end for tonight, folks. Sorry it was something of a short session.

I wasn't working as fast as I usually do, and I apologize for that. You guys kind of threw me for a loop with some of your actions, but all in all I'm interested with where they went.

Hope you enjoyed it.
More to come, as always.

p.c: Begin PART 7.
p.b:
Part 7, Chapter 1.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232183981899.gif[/img]

Tom is scared and angry.
Ruby fumbles for an explanation, an apology -- anything. She assures Tom she would never hurt him. There's nothing wrong with her, and if there was, she's better now.

She doesn't want to hurt him.

p.c: Ruby: Put your scalpel on the ground.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232184115729.gif[/img]

Ruby places the SCALPEL on the ground as a show of good faith. She nervously continues to try to explain, but her voice is shaking.

p.c: Ruby: Step away from the scalpel.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232184237597.gif[/img]

Ruby backs away slowly. Tom seems somewhat placated, but he is still in a panic. He orders Ruby to leave the room. 
Ruby offers that if anything should happen, she will still have her walkie-talkie.

p.c: Ruby: Exit.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232184315694.gif[/img]

Ruby exits the room, leaving Tom alone for the time being. Perhaps some space will help calm things down.
She doesn't know what to do next.

Ruby is shaking. These recent events have unnerved her greatly.
She has a pounding headache.

p.c: Ruby: Go to the cafeteria, drown sorrows with water cooler.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232184455226.gif[/img]

Not knowing where else to go, Ruby heads to the cafeteria.

p.c: Ruby: Look around in a manly manner.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232184620041.gif[/img]

Ruby tries to collect herself and surmises her situation in the most manly manner she can muster.

p.c: Ruby: Inventory check.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232184736346.gif[/img]

Ruby is carrying a BALL OF TWINE, an OXYGEN TANK WITH MASK, and HEAVY RUBBER GLOVES.

p.c: Ruby: Sit down. Try to calm down and think.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232184934790.gif[/img]

Ruby tries to gather her thoughts and calm down. It won't do to go running around willy-nilly.
Where should she go next? She still has to do something. She can't just give up!

p.c: Ruby: Open third eye.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232185105002.gif[/img]

There's no hiding it anymore. Ruby can feel the third eye throbbing in her head, eager to make itself known.

p.c: Ruby: Improvise a weapon.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232185346342.gif[/img]

If Ruby's on her own, she's going to need some defense.  Ruby wraps the incredibly thick gloves with barbed wire to create the PRICKLY FIST.

p.c: Ruby: Head upstairs. Downstairs is Tom's territory now.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232185622984.gif[/img]

Ruby heads upstairs. There may still be things to examine downstairs, but this is a good point, Tom does probably want his space.

p.c: Ruby: Examine room with the third eye.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232186048784.gif[/img]

Ruby can't tell if there are any traps remaining on the pedestal.

Ruby opens her THIRD EYE and closes her others, surveying the room...

p.c: Ruby: Examine "RUBY" painting.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232186236984.gif[/img]

This must be what she saw.
There's some strange, archaic-looking text on the painting, but Ruby can't decipher it.

p.c: Ruby: Use third eye on text.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232186400690.gif[/img]

The text is still incomprehensible.
But Ruby sees that there's something out of place behind it. Something tied to her.

p.c: Ruby: Remove the painting.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232186554921.gif[/img]

There's nothing behind the painting... but Ruby's sure something's here.

p.c: Ruby: Scrape the parchment away with the prickly fist.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232186974105.gif[/img]

Ruby tears back the parchment on the front of the frame. 
There appears to be a large group portrait hidden under it.

p.c: Ruby: Move on to locker room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232187242765.gif[/img]

Ruby rolls up the GROUP PORTRAIT and moves on to the next room.

p.c: Ruby: Check wheel symbol with third eye.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232187593126.gif[/img]

it hurts it hurts it hurts
something from 
the back wall

it hurts

p.c: Ruby: Use third eye...
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232187837346.gif[/img]

Ruby's third eye hurts very badly. Her head is throbbing.

Perhaps overusing it is a bad idea.

p.c: Ruby: Radio Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232188080742.gif[/img]

Ruby radios Tom. 
Tom says he's okay. He's exploring. He'll keep in touch. Ruby assures him she is fine too.
Tom makes it clear he is still not in a very talkative mood.

At least he was polite.

p.c: Ruby: Check the various lockers.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232188273516.gif[/img]

Ruby checks the various lockers.
Most of them are jammed shut, and locker #5 is wedged on its hinges. It looks like it was shut too tightly -- Ruby can't pull it open with her GIRLISH FIGURE.

There is fresh blood on locker 2, however, and the locking mechanism seems to be open.
Ruby considers whether to investigate.

p.c: Ruby: Punch locker in snout to establish superiority.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232188501284.gif[/img]

Ruby punches the locker to show it who's boss. Then she stands to one side and opens it...

...but it's empty, save for a small padlock key taped to the back wall. It looks very purposeful.

p.c: Ruby: Stick face through hole. Be Ceiling Ruby.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232188679631.gif[/img]

Ruby peers down into the room below, where she first woke up.

Tom's bloodied CROWBAR is there -- she must have missed it on her way to the cafeteria, because it's lying in the pit in the center of the room. Obviously, it's no longer stuck in Ace's leg.

p.c: Ruby: Radio Tom. Tell him you found his crowbar.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232188954875.gif[/img]

Ruby contemplates keeping the crowbar should she need it, but instead radios Tom and lets him know where to find his crowbar. 
Ruby heads back towards the upstairs room she emerged from the pipe in.

p.c: Ruby: Look at the corner.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232189150732.gif[/img]

Soft sobbing sounds are coming from the dark corner of the room.
Crying.

p.c: Ruby: Ask figure if they are okay.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232189282616.gif[/img]

The figure continues to cry softly in the corner.

p.c: Ruby: Leave the room.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232189447667.gif[/img]

Ruby gets the distinct feeling that there is something terribly wrong here, and carefully, quietly, leaves the figure be.

p.c: Ruby: Open that cabinet with the padlock key.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232189741828.gif[/img]

Ruby continues upstairs and opens the TALL LOCKER with the PADLOCK KEY.

...it would appear the back of the locker has been removed, in a clever disguise of a hidden door located behind it.
The door appears unlocked...

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232190357804.gif[/img]

Ruby enters the hidden room.
This room is divided into two main sections by a partition wall with no door, leaving both sections separated but accessible.
It appears to be similar to the examination room downstairs, in some ways.

An ACCESS HATCH leading up is sealed with a rather large mechanism, which is linked to a wall panel. 

On the west portion of the room, there is a MEDICINE CABINET.

p.c: Ruby: Use third eye...
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232190357804.gif[/img]

Ruby's third eye is still in pain.

p.c: Ruby: Check cabinet.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232190357804.gif[/img]

Ruby tries to open the cabinet, but it refuses to budge. The tiny lock on the side must be holding it closed.

p.c: Ruby: Jump back before that arm coming around the corner gets you.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232190563159.gif[/img]

Someone's
here.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3429234/images/1232190911369.gif[/img]

The haggard-looking man comes around the corner.

Ruby keeps her weapon at the ready.
The man holds his hands up in a gesture of surrender. 
He looks oddly relieved, and sighs deeply.


[color=#0060c0]"Ruby?... Oh, thank God!"[/color]

Part 7, Chapter 2.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232191127024.gif[/img]

The one-handed man introduces himself as Filbert.

p.c: Ruby: Ask him how he knows you.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232191567048.gif[/img]

Ruby was a patient of his.

p.c: Ruby: Ask him where his hand went.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232191567048.gif[/img]

Filbert calmly explains he severed his hand by slamming it shut in the security transfer chute down in Level 3. He had to, in order to stop the spread of infection.

p.c: Ruby: Ask him to explain infection.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232191924482.gif[/img]

Filbert nods. He explains that he was attacked, and his hand was injured. He says he believes the infection is like any other localized spread -- in order to stop it from contaminating his entire body, he had to perform an emergency amputation.

p.c: Ruby: Question him on what has happened here, what this place is and why you can't remember this stuff.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232191924482.gif[/img]

[color=#0060c0]"Why you can't remember anything? Isn't it obvious?"[/color] Filbert asks.
[color=#0060c0]"You're dead."[/color]

p.c: Ruby: "Did I kill Tom?"
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232192207120.gif[/img]

Filbert says he's afraid you did. He bled out after the attack you must have seen on the video.

p.c: Ruby: "If I'm dead, how am I moving?"
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232192207120.gif[/img]

[color=#0060c0]"You're infected. Most everyone here has succumbed to the infection.
Except for me."[/color]

p.c: Ruby: "Then why did you stumble over to me and say THANK GOD?"
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232192207120.gif[/img]

[color=#0060c0]"It's not important now."[/color]

p.c: Ruby: Ask Filbert about Ace, also, tell him Red killed himself.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232192508654.gif[/img]

Filbert explains that Ace is tasked with duties as an orderly and a security guard. Filbert was his commanding superior.
Filbert says he knows of Red's death. 
[color=#0060c0]"He finally did it,"[/color] Filbert nods.

p.c: Ruby: "Was I sane?"
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232192849777.gif[/img]

[color=#0060c0]"Oh, I doubt it."[/color]

p.c: Ruby: "Is there a cure?"
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232192849777.gif[/img]

[color=#0060c0]"My dear, you ARE the cure."[/color]

Filbert asks if you've found a PASSCODE yet. He needs to get to the TOP LEVEL.
The only option now is ESCAPE. He plans to escape the entire facility. He wants to get out.

p.c: Ruby: "What do you mean by that, me being the cure?"
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232193239198.gif[/img]

Filbert turns, suddenly angry, and lays it all out.

Ruby already HAS the cure. So does everyone else in this facility.
It brought her SIGHT. It made her WELL. She didn't even need to EAT or DRINK.

But when she died, she fucked it up.
The cure was strong. It brought her BACK. And when she came back 
she brought something with her.

Filbert is the only one left untouched. He has to escape. He demands the PASSCODE.

p.c: Ruby: Yell that you don't have the passcode!
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232193598649.gif[/img]

Ruby is all but in shambles. She denies the accusations and tells Filbert she has no idea what the code to the surface is.

Filbert says Ruby has to stay here now.
She can't go to the surface. She can't ESCAPE. She is INFECTED. She is BAD.
Filbert says to stay here while he gets his TOOLS from the medicine cabinet. 

He says he is going to cut Ruby's badness OUT.

p.c: Ruby: Punch the fuck out of Filbert.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232194071534.gif[/img]

Ruby slams Filbert in the face with her SPINY FIST, sending him staggering backwards!
Ruby takes this opportunity to make her escape!

p.c: Ruby: GTFO.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232194461775.gif[/img]

Ruby runs to the next room. Filbert shouts after her -- [color=#0060c0]"Wait!"[/color]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232194646058.gif[/img]

[color=#0060c0]"I said WAIT!"[/color]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232194667801.gif[/img]

Ruby slams the door behind her, holding it closed.

But it won't lock.

p.c: Ruby: Close the cabinet and lock THAT.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232195139463.gif[/img]

Ruby re-locks the padlocked door.

Filbert appears on the monitor.
He shouts angrily at Ruby.
He says he is the only one CLEAN. He is the only one who can ESCAPE. The others have damned themselves.
He says ACE will get her. Ace won't listen to his orders anymore -- he won't even listen to HER. But he is still obedient. Filbert doesn't know who, but he knows he is still listening to SOMEONE.
He says Ace will GET Ruby.

p.c: Ruby: Flip Filbert off. Contact Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232195468322.gif[/img]

Ruby shoots the monitor the bird and it goes back to static.

She radios Tom, and tells him everything that just happened.
Filbert, the "infection" on which even Filbert's account contradicts itself, Ace's obedience, and whoever SHE is. 
Tom tells Ruby to go on ahead. There's something he needs to check first, but he'll meet up with her again shortly.

It sounds as though Tom is ready to try working together again.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232195674017.gif[/img]

A different figure appears on the monitor.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232195815866.gif[/img]

The face on the monitor nods, and the east door, which is wired to the monitor, suddenly unlocks and swings open.

p.c: Ruby: Tell the figure to call off Ace.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232196035334.gif[/img]

The figure stares blankly. 

The figure shudders once, as if involuntarily, then, unexpectedly, begins to speak in a rattling, hoarse voice, its pitch fluctuating unsteadily.

[color=gray]"I can't,"[/color] it says.
[color=gray]"I'm sorry."[/color]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232196126275.gif[/img]

The feed cuts out again.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232196240560.gif[/img]

Ruby enters the newly-opened door, into a new room.

STITCHES is here.

p.c: Ruby: Wave at Stitches. Remark about his lack of stitching. Ask what kind of facial cream he used.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232196478098.gif[/img]

Ruby makes polite conversation, pleased to see Stitches looking so well. He smiles at Ruby and waves back, glad to see she's okay.

p.c: Ruby: Ask him what he's been up to.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232196836827.gif[/img]

Ruby shoves Stitches over the railing.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232196961079.gif[/img]

Stitches falls into the giant fans.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232197146245.gif[/img]

...what...

what just happened?

That isn't what Ruby meant to do!
That isn't what Ruby meant to do at all!

p.c: Ruby: It's a flashback. Snap out of it.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232197338646.gif[/img]

Ruby remembers now.
It was horrible.

She...

...she didn't mean to.

p.c: Ruby: Read the note next to the door.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232197338646.gif[/img]

Ruby's hands are shaking. She picks up the dog-eared NOTE from the PAPER FOLDER on the left side of the door and reads it.

p.c: Ruby: Check the clipboard too.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232197844302.gif[/img]

Ruby reads the CLIPBOARD by the door, as well.

p.c: Ruby: Look behind the plant.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232198381136.gif[/img]

Ruby goes to examine the plant.
TOM enters the room and greets Ruby.

p.c: Ruby: Explain.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232198823048.gif[/img]

Ruby explains the situation to Tom. She even tells him about her flashbacks. 

Tom doesn't seem as fazed as she'd thought.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232199219527.gif[/img]

Tom explains he found this note while digging through the rubble near Red's room.

p.c: Ruby: Click radios.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232199637312.gif[/img]

Ruby discreetly presses the button on her walkie-talkie.

Tom's radio crackers.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Collect yourselves then move to Lab B's doors.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232199866076.gif[/img]

The door is locked with a massive, very distinctive padlock.

p.c: Ruby: Examine plant.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232200141450.gif[/img]

There's nothing behind the plant, and nothing in the pot but the plant and some soil.
It seems to just be... an ordinary plant.

p.c: Tom: Look through windows.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232200324344.gif[/img]

Tom doesn't see anything through the glass.
It's too dark in there.

p.c: Ruby: Look through window with third eye for a short moment. Just long enough to see inside.
p.b: [img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232200486784.gif[/img]

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232200701455.gif[/img]

Ruby looks into Lab B.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3430122/images/1232201083292.gif[/img]

Ruby staggers backwards.

Whatever is in there seems very distinctly unfriendly.

Part 7, Chapter 3.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3431265/images/1232201225814.gif[/img]

The figure in the corner sobs quietly, weeping.

p.c: Ruby: Attempt to talk to it.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3431265/images/1232201317975.gif[/img]

Ruby's attempts at conversation go unheeded.
The figure does not respond.

p.c: Ruby: "Why are you crying?"
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3431265/images/1232201375298.gif[/img]

[color=#000080]"It's dark."[/color]

p.c: Ruby: Ask Tom if he sees it too.
p.b:
[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3431265/images/1232201935319.gif[/img]

Ruby asks Tom for confirmation. He confirms that he sees the same figure.

It shudders in the corner, making a pained sound.

[img]https://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/2009/3431265/images/1232202047681.gif[/img]

The figure turns suddenly, and the room is engulfed in blackness.

[color=#000080]"IT'S SO DARK!"[/color]

p.c: End PART 7.
p.b:
[img]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/294616636726444033/319171450990755840/image.png[/img]

That's it for tonight folks. As always, thank you for bearing with me.

Sort of a short session today. 

More to come.
[img]https://file.garden/@mspfa-archive/discord/attachments/277259751929282563/321753451044405248/metal_glen_5.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/@mspfa-archive/discord/attachments/277259751929282563/321753456090152960/metal_glen_6.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/@mspfa-archive/discord/attachments/277259751929282563/321753461425176580/metal_glen_7.png[/img]

p.c: Begin PART 8.
p.b:
Part 8, Chapter 1.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/1.gif[/img]

The light fades from the room and darkness envelops Ruby and Tom. It is a familiar and horrible kind of darkness. 
The unrelenting sound of moving water deafens their ears. 

Neither Ruby nor Tom are exactly sure where each other are.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Feel around. Try to find one another.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/2.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom grope blindly in the choking blackness to try and find each other. The sound of water is all about them, drowning out their cries.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect with the third eye.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/3.gif[/img]

Ruby opens her third eye, and a guiding vision appears.
Through the sounds of water, she hears a faint voice whispering, calling her onward.

p.c: Tom: Try and find the rail. Ruby: Start walking.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/4.gif[/img]

Ruby begins to follow the arrow. Tom continues searching for Ruby, and finds the rail, following it.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/5.gif[/img]

Ruby feels a set of stairs in the direction the arrow was pointing.

p.c: Tom: Swing your manly fist through the darkness.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/6.gif[/img]

Tom swings his fist.
Ruby feels something hit her foot.

p.c: Ruby: Stop! You're on the rail!
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/7.gif[/img]

Ruby freezes.
The sound of water begins to subside.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/8.gif[/img]

The light suddenly returns in a crackling flash.

p.c: Tom: Save Ruby!
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/9.gif[/img]

Tom helps Ruby down from the railing quickly. The darkness seems to have passed, and the distant voice is gone.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/10.gif[/img]

Ruby closes her third eye and again the two of them consider the door to Lab B.

Ruby has a very strong feeling that before all this is over, she'll have to go in there.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Hug.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/11.gif[/img]

Tom politely explains he doesn't feel like hugging Ruby right now, given the footage they watched together a short while ago. That hug didn't end particularly well.
Maybe they just need some time to trust each other again.

p.c: Ruby: Investigate the blood on the fan.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/11.gif[/img]

The blood on the fan is most likely a spot the cleaners missed after the "accident" Ruby made Stitches have in the fan.

p.c: Tom: Crowbar + Lock.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/11.gif[/img]

The lock is massive and sturdy. No way even Tom's MANLY PHYSIQUE could tear it down!

p.c: Ruby: Check the plant again.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/11.gif[/img]

Ruby checks the plant, but it doesn't appear to be anything but a plant and some soil.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Check on Filbert.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/12.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom return to the previous room.

However, something seems to have changed.

p.c: Tom: Examine that thing you're standing on.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/12.gif[/img]

It's that same severed foot from before. And Tom is gross for stepping on it.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Go inside. Check out everything.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/13.gif[/img]

Tom brings out the BLUDGEONY CANESHOVEL and the two of them enter the room.
...but it appears empty.

p.c: Tom: Open those lockers.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/14.gif[/img]

There is a patient's stool in the southwest corner. It doesn't open.
Against the north wall in what appears to be the examination portion of the room, there is some sort of metal footlocker overgrown with fleshy protuberances.

It resists Tom's attempts to open it, and two long, fleshy growths seem to converge where the lock would normally be, reaching towards each other with a gap in between.

The entire thing seems like an amalgamation of skin, muscle, and vein.

p.c: Tom: Check behind poster on wall. Also, look at your inventory.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/15.gif[/img]

The EYE EXAM chart is bolted to the wall. It appears to be a permanent fixture.

Ruby and Tom check their respective inventories.

p.c: Ruby: Inspect hatch thoroughly.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/16.gif[/img]

The keypad linked to the access hatch in the ceiling is a strange one. 
It has a digit-lock AND a swipe-card slot, and it appears to be lacking power.

Strangely, it is connected to the hatch with both an electric and apparently-organic cord. The fleshy cord reaches from one terminal to the hatch, as does an electrical wire. Crossing the electrical wire is a thing flap of burnt flesh and ash, which appears to be leading to the a set of contacts on the access card reader. 

It seems rather complex. Whatever the case, the burnt flesh appears to be evidence that the two cords have trouble working well together.

p.c: Ruby: Ask where your scalpel is.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/15.gif[/img]

Tom explains that he has added the SCALPEL to his leather pouch of MEDICAL IMPLEMENTS.

p.c: Tom: Smash open the cabinet with your bludgeony caneshovel.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/17.gif[/img]

One of the doctors probably had a TINY KEY to go with this lock.

Tom's no doctor, but he's got the prescription for this medicine cabinet!

After bashing the cabinet open, Tom finds a large jar of TRANQUILIZER inside.

p.c: Tom: Fill syringe with tranquilizer.
p.b:
Tom fills his SYRINGE with LIQUID TRANQUILIZER. He's got several doses worth in there now!
Still, he considers how much good it would do against a behemoth like Ace, should he show up again.

There appear to be three schools of thought on the fleshy locker. Should Tom:
Cut the growths sealing the locker with the scalpel?
Retrieve the fleshy growth from the jar downstairs and use it with the locker?
Inject the growths with tranquilizer?

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Jar growth on locker growths.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/19.gif[/img]

Going by the first 5 responses, the majority is in favor of using the JAR GROWTH on the LOCKER GROWTHS.

Tom and Ruby warily head back downstairs.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/20.gif[/img]

Ruby removes the BARBED WIRE from her RUBBER GLOVES and carefully removes the growth from the jar.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/21.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby return to the hall.

STITCHES is here.

p.c: Ruby: Say hello.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/22.gif[/img]

Ruby's hands are full, and she has nowhere to put the large fleshy growth. She says hi.

Stitches groans hoarsely and growls in response.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/23.gif[/img]

Stitches lunges forward. His intentions are clearly hostile.

He lets loose a pained moan as he staggers at Ruby, claws held high.

[color=#800000][b]ＵＨＡＡＡＨＨ
ＫＩＬＬＬＬＬ　ＭＥ[/b][/color]

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Do a combo move. Run into next room, bait, trip, tranq.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/24.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby prepare for an elaborate maneuver!

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/25.gif[/img]

Ruby trips Stitches with her UNATTRACTIVELY LONG FOOT. As soon as he falls, Tom pins him down using the strength of his MANLY PHYSIQUE and injects a healthy dose of LIQUID TRANQUILIZER into his neck.
Tom keeps Stitches pinned until, after a very nerve-wracking minute or so, he finally goes unconscious.

p.c: Tom: First, loot Stitches. Then, stuff him in a locker.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/26.gif[/img]

Stitches is carrying a TINY KEY labelled "medicine cabinet" in tiny letters. 
...Tom decides to leave it with him.

Tom shoves Stitches into Locker #5 and slams the door close hard enough to jam it on the hinges. It's not much, but it'll do for now. It should keep him safe, and he should be out for a while with all the tranq Tom used.

p.c: Ruby: Give Stitches the group portrait.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/26.gif[/img]

Ruby slips the GROUP PORTRAIT into a paper-thin gap in the locker's edge, at the top. Stitches may appreciate it, perhaps?

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/27.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby resume their original course of action and head back to the upstairs room.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/28.gif[/img]

Ruby places the fleshy growth from the jar into the gap between the other fleshy growths

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/29.gif[/img]

Before Ruby's eyes, the fleshy growths grow together and coil into one another.

The large fleshy mass Ruby placed onto the chest, now connected, begins to beat rhythmically, expanding and contracting with a soft, wet sound.

A moment later, the lid of the locker opens up -- not from the edge, but from the center, peeling itself open.
From inside, Ruby retrieves a FLESHY PROTOTUBE, a bizarre organic item that somehow features an electrical contact panel on one end.

p.c: Ruby: Lick it.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/30.gif[/img]

IT TASTES BAD.

p.c: Ruby: Use fleshy protutube on wall panel.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/32.gif[/img]

Tom cuts away the burnt flesh and Ruby plugs the FLESHY PROTOTUBE into the keypad's contact panel.

It doesn't seem to do much by itself.

p.c: Ruby: Attach knobbly bits to sockets.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/33.gif[/img]

Connecting the FLESHY PROTOTUBE in that way would lay it over the charged electrical wire! That's probably how the last connection got burnt!

p.c: Ruby: Use gloves to insulate the wire.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/34.gif[/img]

Genius!
Ruby wraps the cord in her RUBBER GLOVES and connects the FLESHY PROTOTUBE, leaving both cords intact and connected! 

The key panel lights up, awaiting a 4-digit number.

p.c: Ruby: Enter 0645.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/35.gif[/img]

Ruby punches in the code 0645, and the access card reader lights up.

p.c: Tom: Swipe high-access card.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/36.gif[/img]

Tom swipes the HIGH-ACCESS card.
That seems to have done the trick. The HIGH SECURITY HATCH on the ceiling recedes.
The path upwards is open.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/37.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom ascend to the floor above.

p.c: Tom: Crack open the security station door and try and estimate how large the room is.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/38.gif[/img]

Tom tries the security room door, but it is locked with a SECURITY KEYCARD READER. Even Tom's HIGH ACCESS CARD does no good here.

Ruby and Tom head to Ace's quarters. Tom politely goes first.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/39.gif[/img]

Ace's quarters appear rather starkly furnished.

p.c: Tom: Check Ace's bed.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/40.gif[/img]

Something is very disorienting about this room. The bed appears much larger than Tom originally thought.

Tom finds a SPADE KEY tucked safely under Ace's pillow.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/41.gif[/img] 

Ruby and Tom return to the hall. Filbert's room is securely locked, and the Security room needs a SECURITY CARD. Even Tom's HIGH ACCESS CARD doesn't work here.

p.c: Ruby: Go to the staff wings.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/42.gif[/img]

Ruby opens the door to the other wings...

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/43.gif[/img]

Ruby closes the door.

Ruby decides not to go that way.

p.c: Ruby: Make sure Tom saw what you saw.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/44.gif[/img]

Tom says that if you saw a huge door lined with teeth leading into some sort of horrible abyss then yes, he saw the same thing.

Filbert's door is too sturdy to be bashed or pried open. Further, there is no answer from inside.

p.c: Ruby: Re-examine Tom's eye (the lack thereof).
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/45.gif[/img]

Ruby peels back the bandage on Tom's eye for a moment...

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/46.gif[/img]

Tom's wound seems to be doing well. It doesn't appear to be infected and the earlier bleeding has stopped.

He looks like he'll be fine.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Let's go to the lower levels.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/47.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom head down one level.

p.c: Tom: Fill up the syringe.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/47.gif[/img]

Tom tops off the SYRINGE with LIQUID TRANQUILIZER.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Trek down to the dummy room.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/48.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom decide to begin the long trek all the way back to the DUMMY ROOM.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Continue.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/49.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom continue their trek.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Continue.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/50.gif[/img]

Still going!
They head through the room Ruby woke up in.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Continue.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/51.gif[/img]

Now into the dissipating brig...

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Continue.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/52.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom finally arrive in the DUMMY ROOM, though the DUMMY is still absent.

p.c: Ruby: Use third eye.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/53.gif[/img]

Ruby examines the room with her THIRD EYE.

Something painful emanates from the PAINTING. But it's hollow, distant. Like an echo of something, memories of before.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/54.gif[/img]

A second echo suddenly comes through, piercingly.
It's small, and it's just an echo, but it's still incredibly focused, overpoweringly potent.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/55.gif[/img]

It hurts so badly, and yet...
...and yet it feels strangely good.

It's like a feeling that deep down, Ruby wants to feel forever.

p.c: Tom: Examine clocklike device.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/56.gif[/img]

Ruby recovers a little and wipes the blood from her third eye.

Tom examines the CLOCKLIKE DEVICE.

...it would appear the EYE DIAL is missing.

p.c: Tom: Grab the DO NOT OPEN sticker before leaving with Ruby.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/57.gif[/img]

Tom grabs the DO NOT OPEN sticker for no apparent reason.

Ruby and Tom take a long trek back to the catwalk outside Lab B, but those frames were lost on their way overseas, so we'll just skip to their arrival.

p.c: Tom: Wear the DO NOT OPEN sticker on the chance that it may prevent someone from opening you.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3493055/58.gif[/img]

Done.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Open Lab B.
p.b:
Part 8, Chapter 2.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/59.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom use the SPADE KEY on the lock to Lab B.

The double-doors slide open.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/60.gif[/img]

SUBJECT 6 rises from the pool of light.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/61.gif[/img]

SUBJECT 6's legs appear to have been amputated. His arms are long, thin, and end at bony points instead of hands.

He lies in the center of the room, staring with empty eye sockets towards the door. His ears twitch slightly, listening.

[color=#800080][b]ＩＳ　ＳＯＭＥＯＮＥ　ＴＨＥＲＥ？[/b][/color]

p.c: Ruby: Say hello.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/62.gif[/img]

Ruby begins to speak, but the figure interrupts.

[b][color=#800080]Ｉ　ＣＡＮ＇Ｔ　ＨＥＡＲ　ＹＯＵ，　ＣＨＩＬＤ．
ＣＯＭＥ　ＣＬＯＳＥＲ．[/color][/b]

p.c: Ruby: Speak louder.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/63.gif[/img]

Ruby speaks louder instead of entering the room. Subject 6 appears disappointed, a look of sadness crossing his face. He sits up, facing the door.

p.c: Ruby: Ask his name.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/63.gif[/img]

The look of sadness disappears for a moment. His brow uncreases and he smiles thinly.

[color=#800080][b]ＤＯＮ＇Ｔ　ＹＯＵ　ＲＥＣＯＧＮＩＺＥ　ＭＥ？
ＩＴ＇Ｓ　ＭＥ，　ＴＯＭ．
ＴＨＥ　ＬＯＶＥ　ＯＦ　ＹＯＵＲ　ＬＩＦＥ．[/b][/color]

p.c: Ruby: Look at Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/64.gif[/img]

Tom appears as confused as Ruby.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/65.gif[/img]

Subject 6 turns a bit, suddenly perking up his ears. 

[b][color=#800080]ＬＵＣＹ？　ＬＵＣＹ　ＩＳ　ＴＨＡＴ　ＹＯＵ？
Ｉ　ＫＮＥＷ　ＹＯＵ＇Ｄ　ＣＯＭＥ　ＢＡＣＫ　ＴＯ　ＭＥ．[/color][/b]

p.c: Tom: Feign that you're Lucy.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/66.gif[/img]

[b][color=#800080]ＬＵＣＹ，　Ｉ＇Ｍ　ＳＯ　ＧＬＡＤ　ＹＯＵ＇ＲＥ　ＨＥＲＥ．
Ｉ　ＨＡＶＥ　ＳＯＭＥＴＨＩＮＧ　ＦＯＲ　ＹＯＵ．[/color][/b]

p.c: Tom: Approach. Ruby: Tell #6 to give it to you.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/67.gif[/img]

Approaching the door, Tom realizes the room smells INCREDIBLY FOUL. Ruby agrees -- it's SO noxious, he can't even breathe it. 
[color=#800080][b]
Ｉ　ＣＡＮ＇Ｔ　ＭＯＶＥ，　ＬＵＣＹ．
ＰＬＥＡＳＥ，　ＣＯＭＥ　ＴＯ　ＭＥ．
Ｉ＇Ｍ　ＳＯ　ＬＯＮＥＬＹ　ＨＥＲＥ．[/b][/color]

p.c: Tom: Equip oxygen tank, move in, take the key.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/68.gif[/img]

Tom starts to move in. Subject 6 does not react well.

[b][color=#800080]ＮＯ！
Ｉ　ＳＡＩＤ　ＬＵＣＹ！[/color][/b]

p.c: Ruby: Approach. Use the oxygen mask.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/69.gif[/img]

Ruby slowly approaches, holding the oxygen mask to her mouth to breathe safely.
Subject 6 smiles again.

[color=#800080][b]ＴＨＡＮＫ　ＹＯＵ．[/b][/color]

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/70.gif[/img]

Ruby approaches Subject 6, who stares up at her with empty eyes.

Ruby asks for the key.

p.c: Tom: Feel around for a light switch.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/71.gif[/img]

Tom begins blindly groping just inside the door for a light switch, holding his breath.

Subject 6 holds up the GOLD KEY.

[b][color=#800080]ＴＨＩＳ　ＷＩＬＬ　ＧＥＴ　ＹＯＵ　ＩＮＴＯ　ＨＩＳ　ＯＦＦＩＣＥ．
ＨＥ　ＨＡＳ　ＴＯＯＬＳ　ＩＮ　ＨＩＳ　ＤＥＳＫ．[/color][/b]

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/72.gif[/img]

Tom frantically searches for the light switch. Ruby is not responding to his calls -- it's like she can't hear him.

Tom places the GOLD KEY in Ruby's palm.

[b][color=#800080]ＤＯ　ＭＥ　Ａ　ＦＡＶＯＲ　ＷＨＩＬＥ　ＹＯＵ＇ＲＥ　ＴＨＥＲＥ．
ＣＡＮ　ＹＯＵ　ＢＲＩＮＧ　ＭＥ　ＢＡＣＫ
ＳＣＩＳＳＯＲＳ？

ＴＨＡＮＫ　ＹＯＵ．[/color][/b]

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/73.gif[/img]


Tom finds the light switch.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/74.gif[/img]

As Subject 6 begins to rise off the ground, Ruby beats a hasty retreat.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/75.gif[/img]

Ruby exits the room, closes it, bars it, and locks it.

Tom tries to comfort Ruby.

p.c: Tom: Hug Ruby.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/76.gif[/img]

Tom tries to hug Ruby, but she bolts in the opposite direction of the lab. She clearly wants to put some distance between herself and Subject 6.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/77.gif[/img]

Tom chases after Ruby, where he finds her unlocking the door to Filbert's office.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/78.gif[/img]

Ruby opens the door and peers into Filbert's office.

p.c: Ruby: Read note. Take screwdriver.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/79.gif[/img]

Ruby picks up the FLATHEAD SCREWDRIVER.

On the wall, Filbert has mounted a framed copy of the Hippocratic Oath.

p.c: Ruby: Rummage through the desk drawers.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/80.gif[/img]

Ruby finds a few small scraps of paper in the drawer and decides to read them.

[cutscene]
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/81.gif[/img]
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/82.gif[/img]

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/83.gif[/img]

This is the last scrap of paper in the desk.

There don't appear to be any other tools here either.

[End cutscene]

p.c: Ruby: Search drawers.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/84.gif[/img]

There are many bits of severed flesh in this drawer. It appears they have all been cut from something very cleanly, with great precision.

p.c: Tom: Break open the framed oath.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/85.gif[/img]

Tom totally wrecks the shit out of Filbert's stuff.

The bad news is it doesn't reveal any clues Tom can find.
The good news is he felt pretty good doing it.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/86.gif[/img]

The room appears pretty thoroughly searched.

Tom and Ruby consider their next move.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/87.gif[/img]

Where to now?

p.c: Ruby: Try Filbert's key on security station?
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/88.gif[/img]

One is an actual key, one is a magnetic card reader.

p.c: Ruby: Screwdriver on MEDLAB eye chart.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/89.gif[/img]

Ruby heads downstairs with Tom. 
Ruby begins to unscrew the eye chart.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/90.gif[/img]

...boy, this facility is just FULL of secret cubbyholes.

Inside the hiding place, there is a SHARD OF GREEN WOOD.

p.c: Ruby: To the locker room!
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/91.gif[/img]

Ruby thinks back to the recess on Locker #3.
...There's no way she has the complete key yet!

p.c: Ruby: Unscrew the vent.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/92.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom exit and walk to the adjacent room.
Ruby begins unscrewing the vent.

p.c: Ruby: Wait, shit, wasn't there poison in there?
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/93.gif[/img]

UH OH

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/94.gif[/img]

A now-familiar face shows up on the monitor.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/95.gif[/img]

...and a moment later, the alarm suddenly clears.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/96.gif[/img]


There's something inside the vent... Ruby grabs it.

p.c: Tom: Mouth off to the person behind the monitor.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/97.gif[/img]

Tom recites a paragraph about trite villainy to the blank monitor.

Ruby retrieves the SECURITY ACCESS CARD from the vent!

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/98.gif[/img]

FILBERT arrives.

Filbert announces, in a rough and gravelly voice, that he is going to cut the bad out of both of you.
Until you are as clean as he is.

p.c: End PART 8.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3494380/ruby.gif[/img]


That's it for tonight folks.

Thanks, as always, for sticking with me.

Not much further now. I can feel we're getting pretty close to our ultimate destination.

Good luck for next time!

p.c: Begin PART 9.
p.b:
Part 9, Chapter 1.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/1.gif[/img]

Filbert emerges from the large tube, wielding a BONESAW. He demands that Ruby and Tom, being so clearly infected, must be operated on immediately. He says he will cut them until they are clean.
It would appear Filbert is rather adamant about this.
It would also appear he's gone completely off his head.

p.c: Tom: Run upstairs. Close the hatch before he gets through.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/2.gif[/img]

Filbert is obviously fully-mobile and you have absolutely no head start. Climbing a ladder right next to him probably wouldn't result in a getaway.

If Ruby and Tom are determined to flee, they should find a better method.

p.c: Tom: Attack!
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/3.gif[/img]

Filbert rushes at the two of them with his bonesaw. It's clear he isn't in any mood for discussion!

Tom springs into action with his weapons at the ready. He will end this non-lethally, if he can.
Filbert may be mutating rapidly, but Tom's MANLY PHYSIQUE is still more impressive than that of the good doctor.

p.c: Tom: Try to defeat Filbert with logic.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/4.gif[/img]

Filbert is too focused on his murderous rage to listen to reason. 
It's also apparent that unlike Tom, he has no intention of ending this non-lethally.
His mouth suddenly snaps open into a ferocious, gaping maw as he bellows out a shuddering roar.

p.c: Tom: Crowbar to the jaw!
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/5.gif[/img]

Tom attacks Filbert's GAPING MOUTH with the CROWBAR!

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/6.gif[/img]

Filbert bites the CROWBAR in half.

p.c: Tom: Berserker mode.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/7.gif[/img]

Filbert and Tom really get into it now. There will be no quarter given by either party.
Someone's going to die!
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/8.gif[/img]
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/9.gif[/img]
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/10.gif[/img]

p.c: Tom: Tranquilizer time.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/11.gif[/img]

Filbert is down.
Tom injects Filbert with a hefty dose of the TRANQUILIZER in case he decides to get back up.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Restrain Filbert. Get bonesaw. Check inventory.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/@mspfa-archive/discord/attachments/260174622832459776/345014126109786114/image.png[/img]

Neither Tom nor Ruby has any rope, and the only locker that would open is already jammed shut with Stitches inside.

Ruby and Tom loot the BONESAW, but that's all Filbert seems to be carrying. Tom tells Ruby she should carry it, since she's lacking in weapons.
They both check their inventories, then head back upstairs to the security room.

p.c: Tom: Refill tranqs.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/14.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom run back downstairs first, to grab another syringeful of tranquilizer.
This is the last of it!

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/15.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby return to the upstairs hall and use the SECURITY KEYCARD to open the SECURITY ROOM DOOR.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/16.gif[/img]

Tom peers into the room ahead cautiously.

There is a HUGE CONSOLE on the north wall. There's also a door beside it, a maintenance hatch on the east wall beside which are scattered MANY NOTES. There is also a piece of strange GREEN WOOD lying against the HUGE CONSOLE. 
Finally, there appears to be an INTERCOM inset in the array of security monitoring equipment.

p.c: Ruby: Take wood. Tom: Read notes.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/17.gif[/img]

Ruby adds the piece of GREEN WOOD to the shard she is already carrying. Like the other staff, it resembles a pattern she's seen somewhere else, but it's still missing a piece.

Tom picks up the MANY NOTES and flips through a couple of them.

p.c: Ruby: Examine teeth-like things. Tom: Try to pry open hatch.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/18.gif[/img]

The teeth-like things appear to be marks on where the operator should stand. They're right in front of an alphanumeric keypad, the only set of controls on the entire console Ruby would know how to use.

Tom tries the hatch, but it's stuck tight. A small LED readout below it reads "OVERRIDE ACTIVE, ACCESS DENIED"

p.c: Tom: Try intercom.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/19.gif[/img]

The intercom is marked as an EMERGENCY SURFACE LINE. It should connect directly to the outside world.

Tom presses the button to make contact, but he's not holding his breath for a response.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/20.gif[/img]

Suddenly the intercom radio crackles to life. Tom can hear someone on the other side.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/21.gif[/img]

Tom attempts to make contact with whoever's on the other end.

A strangely familiar voice fires off a litany of incredibly foul (and very unprovoked) profanities directed at Tom.

Tom pauses momentarily, stunned by the response. Just as he attempts to explain his situation, a strange crunching sound -- like something being eaten -- comes from the other end, followed by static.

It would appear the line is now dead.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Operate console.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/22.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom attempt to operate the console, but nothing seems to work. Someone's locked them out.

p.c: Tom: Check the door.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/23.gif[/img]

The door to the lobby is already open.

p.c: Tom: Peek through.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/24.gif[/img]

Tom peeks through the door...

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/25.gif[/img]

Tom has entered the LOBBY a bit excitedly. Freedom seems so close.

p.c: Tom: Politely ask what the HELL THAT THING IS.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/26.gif[/img]

The unhealthy-looking figure hooked up to the wall introduces herself as "Bella".

She says she is very sorry, but she can't let you leave.
She goes on to say she has top priority control of every security system in the facility and she has instituted a lockdown.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Ask her how the situation can be resolved.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/27.gif[/img]

Ruby joins Tom and attempts to convince Bella to let them out.
Bella explains that she is not in charge here. She is merely acting on orders her superiors issued before they abandoned the facility.
She simply cannot open the surface hatch for them. Those are her orders.

Tom menaces for a moment, and Bella responds that she will not fight him.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Ask her if she's seen Ace.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/28.gif[/img]

Bella says she's been focused on watching you two, but if he isn't walking the halls looking for patients, he might be in COLD STORAGE. It's where he keeps the things he's been collecting.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Ask what lead to the lockdown.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/28.gif[/img]

Her superiors ordered it after this facility was abandoned following an outbreak of violence by both patients and staff in the wake of the events on November 1st, namely the suicide of Chief Diagnostician Red.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Ask her what Ace IS.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/28.gif[/img]

Ace is a very loyal orderly. But lately he seems to be ignoring her.

p.c: Ruby: Explain to her that if things continue as they are there isn't going to be a facility left to salvage even IF her superiors return.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/28.gif[/img]

She knows.
But these are her orders.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Ask why Bella is plugged into the wall.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/29.gif[/img]

Bella is kept on life support. Those things don't attack her. Her mind must be intact for her to continue operating. She suspects they don't want to taint it with her running the facility's systems.

A very angry-sounding thumping noise shakes the ground in frustrated peals and an echoing, eerie voice comes from the lower levels.

[color=#800080][b]ＬＵＣＹ！　ＬＵＣＹ？！
ＬＵＣＩＬＬＥ！[/b][/color]

p.c: Ruby: Ask Bella where cold storage is.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/30.gif[/img]

Bella says Cold Storage is on Level 2.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Bella why she's been helping us if she's not allowed to let us leave.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/30.gif[/img]

She was ordered to stop you from leaving. She was never ordered to avoid keeping you alive.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Bella if there are circumstances under which the lockdown can be lifted and the door to the surface opened.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/30.gif[/img]

As long as she is holding manual lockdown in place, surface access cannot be obtained.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Bella for today's date.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/30.gif[/img]

Today is October 31st.

p.c: Ruby: Ask how many times this situation has played out.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/31.gif[/img]

Dozens of times.
But she says you've only made it so far as to see her three times before.

She says that this is as far as you've ever gotten.
As long as she's alive, she will maintain the lockdown.

p.c: Ruby: Ask for scissors.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/32.gif[/img]

Bella says that all scissors have been confiscated and hidden after the last time the patient in Lab B got hold of a pair.

p.c: Ruby: Ask if the lockdown would end if we killed her.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/33.gif[/img]

Bella wants to show you something.

A panel on the wall opens, revealing a glass window. Beyond the glass, there is water.
Orange light filters through the shimmering waters. It would appear this room is very near to the surface.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/34.gif[/img]

Every day for over a year now, Bella has had to watch the sun rise and set, from just barely below the surface. Strapped to this wall, right next to the exit, able to watch the outside world, but never touch it.

Yes, she answers.
If you kill her, the lockdown will end.

p.c: Ruby: Ask if she wishes to die.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/35.gif[/img]

[color=#808080]"Yes."[/color]

p.c: Ruby: Ask that if we killed her, wouldn't she come back to life?
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/36.gif[/img]

Bella is the only one who the infection has passed over, because to taint her mind would be to compromise the integrity of the facility, and thus everyone and everything inside it.

p.c: Ruby: Ask if disconnecting her would kill her.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/36.gif[/img]
[color=#808080]
"Yes."[/color]

p.c: Ruby: Say that if we just open the doors and leave, everything else gets out too.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/36.gif[/img]

Bella offers that you could close it behind you.

p.c: Ruby: Ask Bella if this facility can self-destruct and if that would eliminate the infection.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/37.gif[/img]

Bella says there is no infection. The only disease here is the one the doctors made.

Bella sees Ruby's hesitation and tells her that she left herself something. 
It's in the water cooler.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Water cooler.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/38.gif[/img]

NO.
This isn't fair, Bella says. She helped you, now you have to help her. 
This time you have to kill her, she says. You have to let her wake up from this bad dream.
This time you have to make the right choice.

p.c: Tom: Tranquilize her.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/39.gif[/img]

Tom injects the LIQUID TRANQUILIZER but Bella only becomes angry. She explains that the systems she's hooked up to have replaced most of her body functions and will easily keep her conscious against the tranquilizer.

She goes on to say that Tom and Ruby do not want the person in charge of security to be against them.
She has asked nicely, she has helped them come this far, but now she is putting her foot down. She will lock doors, activate traps, and seal rooms if they persist. 
This time, she says, she's not going to give them a choice. They have to end her life now.
There is no other option.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: ...very well.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/40.gif[/img]

...Tom and Ruby seem to have no choice.
Tom pulls the plunger back on the syringe and with great hesitation, injects the air into Bella's bloodstream.

Tom apologizes quietly for not being able to save her.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/41.gif[/img]

Tom does his best to disconnect Bella from her life support. She passes into unconsciousness.

Moments later, Bella passes away.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Head downstairs.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/42.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom return to the security room.
It would seem Bella's death has also caused a minor systems/power shutdown. A blinking green light indicates the electrical maintenance hatch is open, however.

p.c: Ruby: Lessee what we can do in the maintenance.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/43.gif[/img]

Ruby, with her GIRLISH FIGURE, is able to squeeze into the cramped maintenance tunnel.
A handy BLINKING GREEN BUTTON illuminates itself from within.

p.c: Ruby: Press the button.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/44.gif[/img]

Ruby crawls a short way into the dark tunnel and presses the glowing green button.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/45.gif[/img]

Ruby presses the green button, and the power seems to come back on.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/46.gif[/img]

[color=#800080][b]ＳＯ　ＷＨＥＲＥ　ＡＲＥ　ＴＨＯＳＥ　ＳＣＩＳＳＯＲＳ？[/b][/color]

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/47.gif[/img]

Tom helps pull Ruby back out by her feet as she tries in vain to stutter out a frantic explanation.
Inside the hatch, they can hear something skittering closer.

p.c: Tom: Bar the hatch shut with the caneshovel.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/48.gif[/img]

Tom jams the door closed with his BLUDGEONY CANESHOVEL. Something starts clawing against the other side, but surprisingly enough, the sturdy hatch seems to hold fast.

p.c: Tom: Check the console.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/49.gif[/img]

The console responds favorably. It looks like Bella was telling the truth.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/50.gif[/img]

The console is suddenly ruptured by a large fleshy growth bearing a gleaming yellow eye.
It appears to be impeded by the bulky console, but the system has been damaged. An error message flashes onto the screen.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Head downstairs.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/51.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby head down to the room with the water cooler.

On the way down, they pass by Filbert, who is still unconscious where they left him. He appears to be breathing, however.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/52.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom descend to the cafeteria room, passing through the upstairs thoroughfare on the way.

Tom moves to take the top off the water cooler so they can look inside.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/53.gif[/img]

Stashed inside the cooler itself is an oddly-shaped shard of GREEN WOOD.
Ruby adds the last piece and assembles the second GREEN STAFF.

Should they head upstairs to the locker now, or should they check the nearby backup console first?

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Console, console!
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/54.gif[/img]

Early consensus was on console.
It's a moot point anyway, since the console doesn't seem to have power. There's still a familiar symbol hanging above it.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Upstairs to locker room.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/55.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby head back upstairs, making the trek to the room directly above them, since they have no means to climb the hole in the ceiling.

Ruby places the GREEN STAFF in the carved recesses on the locker's face.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/56.gif[/img]

The locker's door swings open, revealing a switch to match the one in the other locker they'd opened with the first GREEN STAFF.

Ruby figures she might as well pull this switch, too.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/57.gif[/img]

With both switches pulled, lockers 3 and 4 suddenly shift apart and pull aside to reveal a hidden door on the wall behind the giant machine.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Ready weapons. Go in.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/58.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby pass through the door. 

Into the mouth of madness.
<meta name="theme-color" content="#900000">

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/59.gif[/img]

The locker on the left appears to be sealed. The one on the right is bent and partially melted in places, and appears to be simply jammed shut. Not even Tom can force it open, and its hinges appear to have been messed with as well.

Ruby rationalizes they must be the two missing lockers -- the ones from the room where she woke up. <meta name="theme-color" content="#900000">

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Disobey the warning on the water filtration unit.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/60.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby look inside the water filtration unit.

Something inside looks back at them. <meta name="theme-color" content="#900000">

p.c: Ruby: Say hello.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/61.gif[/img]

[color=#400040]"It'sss... so dark...
khh...iiill mmeee.."[/color] <meta name="theme-color" content="#900000">

p.c: Tom: Collect eye dial.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/62.gif[/img]

Tom grabs the EYE DIAL from the filtration unit. Ruby, already emotionally distraught after the incident with Bella, is confused. She doesn't know what to do with this individual who lies half-submerged in water. <meta name="theme-color" content="#900000">

p.c: Ruby: Free the bird.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/63.gif[/img]

Ruby pleads with Tom. This one can still be saved, she says.
Tom and Ruby carefully remove him from the three large hooks keeping him in the chamber. It's a rather painful process and his groans of pain only subside when Tom finally hauls him out of the cramped, flooded chamber. <meta name="theme-color" content="#900000">

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/64.gif[/img]

A loud creaking sound catches the attention of Tom and Ruby.

The locker in the back of the room has begun to open. <meta name="theme-color" content="#900000">

p.c: Ruby: Grab ACE'S MASK!
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/65.gif[/img]

Unfortunately, ACE has already taken his mask.

<meta name="theme-color" content="#900000">

p.c: Ruby, Tom: GTFO
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/66.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom get the hell out of dodge, carrying the other prisoner with them.

<meta name="theme-color" content="#900000">

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/67.gif[/img]

Tom and Ruby escape from Ace's lair in cold storage. They seal the area behind them, but knowing Ace, it won't hold him for long. Whatever they're going to do, they had better do it FAST. Ace is clearly on a mission and this facility will not be safe for them for very much longer. 

Tom's MANLY PHYSIQUE allows him to carry the prisoner with relative ease, but his move speed is still reduced. Perhaps things would move faster if he and Ruby split up.

Remember, TIME IS OF THE ESSENCE! 
Go!

p.c: Ruby: Get Stitches from his locker.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/68.gif[/img]

It would appear that locker #5 is ALREADY OPEN.

p.c: Tom: Put Emobird in a locker?
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/68.gif[/img]

It could take days for the locker to have any kind of effect on the prisoner! Is that really what you'd want anyway?

p.c: Weaver: Give a hint!
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3598716/69.gif[/img]

In the time it would take Tom to drag the weakened prisoner up to the exit, Ruby could probably reach both the dummy room and then the downstairs console. 
At least, she could if she took a shortcut...

Part 9, Chapter 2.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/70.gif[/img]

Tom begins to carry their new acquaintance upstairs, making his way to the surface access hatch.

Ruby jumps down into the room below, trying to reach the symbol-laden clock downstairs as quickly as possible.

It's only a matter of time until Ace escapes again, and he'll be looking for them.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/71.gif[/img]

Ruby lands safely in the room below.
The backup console here is still not receiving power.

She quickly heads downstairs to the clock dial, now that she's recovered the wooden EYE PEG.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: Make sure you can hear each other.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/72.gif[/img]

Good idea. Ruby and Tom both make sure their radios are on.

Ruby quickly climbs down into the brig, which is still as broken as ever, and darts into the side room.
There, she finally replaces the wooden EYE PEG and dials it to the symbol that corresponds to the console she used when she first woke up.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/73.gif[/img]

Actually, the Brig seems worse than ever.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/74.gif[/img]

The system returns to power and begins to slowly start up.

p.c: Ruby: Be Tom.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/75.gif[/img]

While Ruby waits for the system to respond, Tom runs into FILBERT. Apparently he shook off a massive dose of tranquilizer rather quickly. He menaces with spikes of flesh at Tom. He seems even more ravenously determined than last time, eager to rip Tom to pieces.

This is the last thing he needed. He's got to get to the exit.
Tom doesn't fucking have TIME for this!

p.c: Tom: Yell at Filbert.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/76.gif[/img]

Filbert clearly isn't listening. He's beyond reasoning with now.

Filbert lunges at Tom!

p.c: Tom: Use MANLY PHYSIQUE to kill Filbert.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/77.gif[/img]

Tom has had enough of this shit.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/78.gif[/img]

No chances this time.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/79.gif[/img]

Tom has no idea how that just happened.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/80.gif[/img]

It was pretty cool though.

p.c: Tom: Be Ruby.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/81.gif[/img]

Tom continues upstairs with the ex-prisoner.

Meanwhile, Ruby has finally accessed the console -- and the results are GOOD.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/82.gif[/img]

Ruby tears ass to get upstairs as fast as possible. As she climbs up the thoroughfare ladder, she hears the door to the cells being opened.

Ace won't be far behind, and from the loud noises of him slamming around, he seems ANGRY.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/83.gif[/img]

Ruby finally reaches the upper level and bursts into the security room, only to find a monstrously gigantic, fleshy abomination covered in eyes, looking like a huge and horribly mutated version of Subject Six.
It appears to be cowering in the corner, and doesn't seem to notice Ruby.

[b][color=#800080]ＨＥ＇Ｓ　ＣＯＭＩＮＧ
ＡＣＥ　ＩＳ　ＣＯＭＩＮＧ
ＨＥ＇Ｓ　ＧＯＩＮＧ　ＴＯ　ＬＯＣＫ　ＭＥ　ＵＰ
Ｉ＇Ｍ　ＳＣＡＲＥＤ，　ＭＯＭＭＹ[/color][/b]

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/84.gif[/img]

Out of pity, Ruby tries to call to Subject Six, but it's no good. He sits shivering in his grief, muttering to himself in fear of Ace.

Ruby enters the Lobby. The ex-prisoner seems to have regained some of his motor skills and is shakily climbing the now-open ladder upwards. Tom says his name is "Jay".

Tom is visibly shaken. If that giant monster is afraid of Ace, he doesn't stand a chance, even if he were to manage another burst of adrenaline.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/85.gif[/img]

Tom begins talking to Ruby as quickly as possible:
There is now a very serious problem. Ace will be here in a matter of seconds. There's no time for them to get to the surface and close the hatch.
Someone will have to stay behind and distract him so the other can get to safety.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/86.gif[/img]

Tom tells Ruby to take the ladder NOW.
There is no way either of them would survive an encounter with Ace. 

[color=#0000ff]"Goodbye, Ruby."[/color]

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/88.gif[/img]

Ruby kisses Tom goodbye.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/89.gif[/img]

Ruby climbs the ladder as quickly as she can.

It's time to take a stand.
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/90.gif[/img]
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/91.gif[/img]

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/92.gif[/img]

Tom takes this opportunity to get the fuck out.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/93.gif[/img]

Tom takes a moment to reflect on how tragic it is that sometimes actions have to have consequences, good or bad. 

Ruby is relieved beyond words that Tom made it up. She's also glad she saw him coming up before she slammed the hatch shut.

Tom and Ruby close the door behind them.
Jay has been loaded onto the tram.

p.c: Ruby, Tom: ROLL OUT ON THE RAILROAD!
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/94.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom hop on the tram and survey the simple controls.
Ruby opens the STEEL DOOR. Beyond it lies fresh air, and a long track leading to the mainland, leading over the water.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/95.gif[/img]

The tram begins to move, leading out towards the land beyond.  It's on an automated track, so it will continue on without Ruby or Tom needing to do anything. CHOO CHOO!

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/96.gif[/img]

The tram pulls away, leaving the station behind.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/97.gif[/img]

Ruby and Tom head towards land as the tram slowly crosses the land bridge.
Jay sleeps at the fore of the tram, recovering from his ordeal.

Tom tosses away all the NOTES he's been collecting. He is happy just to be alive.
He never wants to READ another NOTE as long as he lives.

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/98.gif[/img]

Tom breaks out the champagne. 
He and Ruby decide now is a good time to celebrate.
They pour, they toast, they drink.

To freedom.
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/99.gif[/img]
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/100.gif[/img]

[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/101.gif[/img]

~♠THE END♠~

p.c: THE END.
p.b:
[img]https://evilcorporation.com.br/rubyquest/images/3601326/ruby.gif[/img] Well, that's the true end, everyone. I hope you had as much fun playing as I did running this little campaign for you. It's been a long run but it's finally over. All stories have to come to an end sooner or later. Thanks for your patience, your support, and your encouragement. It's been a blast.
